Dangay kaboo here, kuntayaŋ kaŋ kuuyanoo manʼti kala kabedaaru woyguu (50), ngi ganji woyaa (10), nda ngi feraw woyaa (10), nda ganjey korbawey nda hawahayey manʼti kala nzorfu kaaray.
Dandi kaboo here, waynahunay kaboo ga, kabedaaru woyguu (50).
Kunta kabedaaru woy cindi guu (15) bara caraw foo ga, ngi nda ngi ganji hinzaa, nda ngi feraw hinzaa.
Caraw faa mo se, ka koy batumaa miɲoo boŋ foo ga ka koy boŋ faa ga, kunta kabedaaru woy cindi guu (15), nda ngi ganji hinzaa, nda ngi feraw hinzaa goo.
Batumaa kuntawey kul kaŋ gʼa kuubi manʼti kala šukka baana yakuwante.

Ganjey ferawey manʼti kala alhan, ganjey korbawey nda hawahayey manʼti kala nzorfu kaaray. Ganjey boŋey mana daabandi nda kala nzorfu kaaray. Batumaa ganjey kul, nzorfu kaaray hawahayayaŋ no mʼi dii cere ga.

Batumaa miɲoo ridowoo, maale kʼa kay, šukka bula, nda iciray henna, nda iciray zaram, nda šukka baana yakuwante nda a teendi. Ridowoo kuuyanoo manʼti kala kabedaaru waranka (20), nga kayyanoo manʼti kala kabedaaru guu. Ridowoo kayyanoo nda batumaa kuntawey hayyanoo kul ti deede foo.
Nga ganji taacaa, nda nga cee taacaa manʼti kala alhan, korbawey nda ngi hawahayey manʼti kala nzorfu kaaray, ngi boŋey mana daabandi nda kala nzorfu kaaray.
Irkoy gorodogoo sukahayey nda batumaa sukahayey kul manʼti kala alhan.

Woo ti jinawey hinnaa kaŋ huru Irkoy gorodogoo cinayanoo ra kaŋ ti seedetaraa gorodogoo, kaŋ teendi ka sawa nda Musa yaamaroo. Lewi borey goyoo, sargari juwalkaa Haruna izʼaroo Itamar ti goyoo jinehunoo.
Betesalel, Uri izʼaroo, Hur haamaa kaŋ ti Žuda alkabiilaa boro na hayey kul tee kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
Oholiyab, Ahisamak izʼaroo kaŋ ti Dan alkabiilaa boro goo a bande, assana goykaw no, maale goy no a ga tee, a ga šukka bula, nda iciray henna, nda iciray zaram, nda šukka baana kay.
Wuragoo kul kaŋ tee sargari zinji-zinjante ka huru nongu henanantaa cinayanoo goyey kul ra manʼti kala ton foo cine ka sawa nda nongu henanantaa wura tammaa alkadaroo..
Nzorfu kaaraa kaŋ borey kaŋ kabandi jamaa ra kate a manʼti kala ton hinza nda jere cine ka sawa nda nongu henanantaa nzorfu kaaray tammaa alkadaroo.

Woo ga sawa nda boro foo kul beka tamma foo kaŋ alkadaroo ti nzorfu kaaray tamma jere ka sawa nda nongu henanantaa nzorfu kaaray tammaa alkadaroo. Arey kul kaŋ kabandi kaŋ goo nda jiiri waranka (20) nda wey kaŋ bisa a, maanaa boro zenber zangu iddu nda zenber hinza nda zangu guu nda woyguu (603.550).
Ton hinza no ka mennandi ka tee nongu henanantaa ferawey nda ridowoo ganjey ferawey, feraw zangu (100) mana teendi nda kala ton hinza, feraw foo kul kilo waranza (30).
A na nzorfu kaaray tamma boŋ zenber foo nda zangu iyye nda woyye cindi guwaa (1.775) ka ganjey korbawey tee, i na boŋey daabu, i na hawahayey daŋ cere ga.
Alhanoo hinnaa kaŋ Izirayel borey nʼa noo sargari zinji-zinjante manʼti kala ton hinka nda jere cine.
A na wey tee feraw cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo se, a na alhan sargari tonadogoo, nda alhan ham tonaguuroo tee, nda sargari tonadogoo jinawey kul,
nda batumaa ferawey, nda batumaa miɲoo ferawey, nda hukkumoo sukahayey kul kaŋ gʼa kuubi.

Šukka bulaa, nda iciray hennaa, nda iciray zaramoo nda i na bankaaray cere-cerantey tee kaŋ nda goyoo ga teendi nongu henanantaa ra nda Haruna bankaaray henanantey, sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
I na beene kaayi-izoo tee nda wura, nda šukka bula, nda iciray henna, nda iciray zaram, nda šukka baana yakuwante.
I na wuragey kar kʼi tefayandi, i nʼi dunbu-dunbu sanda šilli kʼi daŋ šukka bulaa, nda iciraa, nda iciray zaramoo ra, nda šukka baana yakuwantaa ra, assana goykaw goy no.
I na karfu-izeyaŋ tee a se kaŋ gʼi dii cere ga, ka mee hinkaa dii cere ga.

Beene kaayi-izoo nda nga gamahawoo kaŋ goo a se beene kul mana tee kala affoo, nga nda beene kaayi-izoo kul mana teendi kala nda haya follokey no: wura, nda šukka bula, nda iciray henna, nda iciray zaram nda šukka baana yakuwante, sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
I na oniks tondiyaŋ kaŋ gorandi wura ra soolu, i na Izirayel borey maaɲey žeeri a ga sanda tammaasa.
I nʼi daŋ beene kaayi-izoo karfu-izey ga kʼa tee tondi hongandihaya Izirayel borey se sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
Woo banda ga, i na albaytoo tee sanda takaa kaŋ nda i na beene kaayi-izoo tee, i nʼa tee nda wura, nda šukka bula, nda iciray henna, nda iciray zaram, nda šukka baana yakuwante, assana goykaw goy no.
Caraw taacaa kul ga sawa, i nʼa taabu ihinka, nga kuuyanoo ga too kabetaami foo, nga hayyanoo ga too kabetaami foo. Albaytoo taabandi ihinka.
I nʼa taalam nda tondi sorro taaci: sorro jinaa mana teendi nda kala sarduwan, nda topaz, nda emerod.
Sorro hinkantoo mana teendi nda kala tirkuwaz, nda safir, nda luulu.
Sorro hinzantoo mana teendi nda kala opal, nda agat, nda ametist.
Sorro taacantoo mana teendi nda kala beril, nda oniks, nda žasp. Tondey si gorandi kala ngi wura gorandihayey ra.
Tondey ga sawa nda Izirayel borey maaɲey, i manʼti kala iwoy cindi hinka (12) sanda maaɲey. I nʼi žeeri sanda tammaasa, affoo kul nda nga maaɲoo, zama alkabiila woy cindi hinka (12) no.
I na wura alhakiika šešeri kaŋ teendi sanda karfu bibiranteyaŋ daŋ albaytoo ga.
I na wura gorandihaya hinka nda wura korbay hinka tee. I na korbay hinkaa daŋ albaytoo kanje hinkaa ga.
I na wura karfu hinkaa haw korbay hinkaa ga kaŋ goo albaytoo kanjey ga.
Woo banda ga, i na karfey boŋ hinkaa haw gorandihaya hinkaa ga kʼi haw beene kaayi-izoo karfu-izey ga jineheroo ra.
I na wura korbay hinka tana tee kʼi daŋ albaytoo kanje hinkaa ga, miɲoo ga beene kaayi-izoo gundoo ra.
I na wura korbay hinka tana tee koyne kʼi haw beene kaayi-izoo karfu-izey ga ganda, jinehere nongoo kaŋ ga i ga hawa jeroo ga, beene kaayi-izoo gamahawoo se beene.

I na karfu bula ka albaytoo korbawey dii beene kaayi-izoo waney ga hala albaytoo ma cindi beene kaayi-izoo gamahawoo ga, albaytoo masi hun dogoo ra beene kaayi-izoo ga, sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
Forkiyaa kaŋ ga huru beene kaayi-izoo cire teendi, maale kʼa kay, a kul mana teendi nda kala šukka bula.
Funoo kaŋ i nʼa kaa forkiyaa gamoo ra ga kate a ma tee sanda guuru darbay, funoo miɲoo bande kunga goo hala a masi kottu.
Forkiyaa gandahere miɲoo ga i na grenad-ize šukkayaŋ, ibula, nda iciray henna, nda iciray zaram yakuwante daŋ.
I na guuru-izeyaŋ kaŋ ga hẽe tee nda wura alhakiika kʼi daŋ forkiyaa miɲoo kul bande grenad-izey game.
Guuru-ize foo, grenad-ize foo, guuru-ize foo, grenad-ize foo, forkiyaa miɲoo kul bande, ka goyoo tee sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
Woo banda ga, i na šukka baana darbay beerey tee Haruna nda nga izʼarey se, maale kʼi kay.
I na fatalaa tee nda šukka baana, i na fuulawey tee nda šukka baana, i na npogawey tee nda šukka baana. I mana teendi nda kala šukka baana yakuwante.
Gamahawoo i nʼa tee nda šukka baana yakuwante, nda šukka bula, nda iciray henna, nda iciray zaram, maale kʼa kay, sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
I na teɲa taalam henanantaa tee, i nʼa tee nda wura alhakiika, i na hantum kar a ga kaŋ ga tee sanda tammaasa kaŋ ga nee: «A yeetandi jere ga Abadantaa se».
Woo banda ga, i na karfu bula haw a ga kʼa dii fatalaa ga, sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
Takaa woo nda Irkoy gorodogoo kaŋ ti cere kubayyan hukkumoo goyoo kul ben. Izirayel borey na hayaa kul tee ka sawa nda woo kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar, i nʼa tee nda takaa din da.
I koy nda Irkoy gorodogoo Musa do: hukkumoo nda nga jinawey kul, nda kanjihayey, nda bundu tefawey, nda hayey kaŋ ga gaaru-gaaru, nda ganjey, nda ferawey.
Nda kuntaa kaŋ teendi nda feeji gaaru kuuruyaŋ kaŋ cirayandi, nda kuntaa kaŋ teendi nda ayu kuuruyaŋ, nda zaaraa kaŋ ga tee rido.
Nda seedetaraa sundukoo nda gobey, nda daabirjoo.
Nda taabaloo nda nga jinawey kul, nda takulawey kaŋ jisandi Irkoy jine.
Nda fitilla gorodoo henanantaa
, nda fitillawey cere bande, nda nga jinawey kul, nda jiyoo kaŋ gʼi diinandi.
Nda wura sargari tonadogoo, nda yonyan jiyoo, nda dugu hew kaanaa, nda ridowoo kaŋ goo hukkumoo miɲoo ga.
Nda alhan sargari tonadogoo, nda nga alhan ham tonaguuroo, nda nga gobey, nda nga jinawey kul, nda taasa beeroo nda hayaa kaŋ ga a ga goro.

Nda batumaa kuntawey, nda nga ganjey, nda nga ferawey, nda batumaa miɲoo ridowoo, nda nga karfey, nda nga sukahayey, nda jinawey kul kaŋ ga hima ka huru Irkoy gorodogoo kaŋ ti cere kubayyan hukkumoo goyoo ra.
Nda bankaaray cere-cerantey kaŋ nda i ga goyoo tee nongu henanantaa ra, nda sargari juwalkaa Haruna bankaaray henanantey, nda nga izʼarey bankaarawey kaŋ nda i ga sargari juwalyan goyoo tee.
Izirayel borey na goyoo kul tee sanda takaa kul kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
Musa dii goyoo kul, nga ne, i nʼa tee nda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa nʼa yaamar, i nʼa tee nda takaa din da. Musa gaara i se.
Abadantaa šelaŋ Musa se ka nee:
«Handu jinaa zaari jinaa ma Irkoy gorodogoo kaŋ ti cere kubayyan hukkumoo cin.
Ma seedetaraa sundukoo daŋ a ra, ma ridowoo kʼa jejebu.
Ma kate taabaloo, ma hayey hanse a ga kaŋ ga hima ka hansandi. Ma kate fitilla gorodogoo, ma fitillawey daŋ a ga.
Ma wura dugu diinandidogoo daŋ sundukoo jine, ma ridowoo daŋ Irkoy gorodogoo miɲoo ga.
Ma sargari kukurantey tonadogoo daŋ Irkoy gorodogoo kaŋ ti cere kubayyan hukkumoo, miɲoo ga.
Ma taasa beeroo daŋ cere kubayyan hukkumoo nda sargari tonadogoo game, ma hari daŋ a ra.
Ma batumaa kuubi-ka-beraa kayandi, ma ridowoo daŋ batumaa miɲoo ga.
Ma yonyan jiyoo zaa ka hugoo nda haya kul kaŋ goo a ra yon, ma nga nda nga jinawey kul yeeti jere ga ya ne, a ga tee haya henanante.
Ma sargari kukurantey tonadogoo nda nga jinawey kul yon, mʼa yeeti jere ga ya ne hala a ma tee haya kaŋ ga hanse ka henan.
Ma taasa beeroo yon, nga nda hayaa kaŋ ga a ga goro, mʼa yeeti jere ga ya ne.
Ma Haruna nda nga izʼarey manandi cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga, mʼi ɲumay nda hari.
Ma bankaaray henanantey daŋ Haruna ga, mʼa yon, de mʼa yeeti jere ga ya ne hala a ma sargari juwalkaw goyoo tee ya ne.
Ma nga izʼarey mo manandi ka darbay beerey daŋ i ga.
Mʼi yon sanda ngi baaba takaa hala i ma ngi sargari juwalyan goyoo tee ya ne, ngi yonyanoo ga tee hayaa kaŋ ga kate i ma ngi sargari juwalyan goyoo tee ya ne hala abada ngi zamaney ra.»
Musa na hayey kul tee nda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa nʼa yaamar. A nʼa tee nda takaa din da.
Jiiri hinkantoo handu jinaa zaari jinaa Irkoy gorodogoo cinandi.
Musa na Irkoy gorodogoo cin, a na ferawey daŋ, a na bundu tefawey kayandi, a na gaaru-gaarey daŋ, a na ganjey kayandi.
A na hukkumoo daŋ Irkoy gorodogoo ga, a na hukkumoo daabandoo daŋ a ga sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
A na seedetaraa hantumoo zaa kʼa daŋ sundukoo ra, a na sundukoo gobey daŋ, a na daabirjoo gum a ga.
A na sundukoo ka koy Irkoy gorodogoo ra, a na zaaraa daŋ kaŋ ga tee rido, ka seedetaraa sundukoo jejebu sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
A na taabaloo daŋ cere kubayyan hukkumoo ra, Irkoy gorodogoo hawsa kaboo here, ridowoo se tarayhere.
A na takulawey hanse kʼi daŋ cere bande Abadantaa jine, sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
A na fitilla gorodogoo daŋ cere kubayyan hukkumoo ra, a ga taabaloo tenje, Irkoy gorodogoo gurma kaboo here.
A na fitillawey daŋ Abadantaa jine sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
A na wura sargari tonadogoo daŋ cere kubayyan hukkumoo ra, ridowoo jinoo ra.
A na dugu hew kaanaa dullandi a ga, sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
A na ridowoo daŋ hugoo miɲoo ga.
A na sargari kukurantey tonadogoo daŋ cere kubayyan hukkumoo hugoo miɲoo ga, a na sargari kukurantaa kaa a ga, a na taasu sargaroo kaa, sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
A na taasa beeroo daŋ cere kubayyan hukkumoo nda sargari tonadogoo game, a na hari daŋ a ra ka alwala.
Musa, nda Haruna nda nga izʼarey na ngi kabey nda ngi cewey ɲumay a ra.
Waati kaŋ i ga huru cere kubayyan hukkumoo ra, nda waati kaŋ i ga too sargari tonadogoo do, i ga ɲumay, sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
A na batumaa cin ka Irkoy gorodogoo nda sargari tonadogoo kuubi kʼa bere, a na ridowoo daŋ batumaa miɲoo ga. Takaa woo nda Musa na goyoo tee kʼa benandi.
Duulaa na cere kubayyan hukkumoo gum, de Abadantaa daržaa na Irkoy gorodogoo too.
Musa mana hin ka huru cere kubayyan hukkumoo ra, zama duulaa cindi a ga, de Abadantaa daržaa na Irkoy gorodogoo too.
Waati kaŋ duulaa tun Irkoy gorodogoo boŋ, nga no Izirayel borey ga koy jine ngi naarumaa ra. I ga koy nongu nda nongu.
Nda duulaa mana tun, i si koy hala han kaŋ a tun.
Zama zaari here Abadantaa duulaa goo Irkoy gorodogoo boŋ, cijin here nuune ga dii duulaa ra, Izirayel hugoo kul jine, woo teendi ngi naarumaa kul ra, nongu ka koy nongu.
Leviticus: Abadantaa na Musa cee cere kubayyan hukkumoo do ka šelaŋ a se ka nee:
«Šelaŋ Izirayel borey se, nee i se: ‹Nda boro foo war ra ga baa nga ma adabba tee sargari Abadantaa maaɲoo ga, a mʼa kaa alman beerey wala ibuuney ra.
Nda hayaa kaŋ a gʼa kaa manʼti kala haw-ize sargari kukurante, a ma tee aru kaŋ ga malal sii, a ma sargaroo kaa cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga hala Abadantaa ma duu kʼa taa.
A ma nga kaboo fur sargari kukurantaa almanoo boŋoo ga, Abadantaa gʼa taa, ka nga zunubey tuusu.
A ma haw-izoo koosu Abadantaa jine. Haruna izʼarey, sargari juwalkey ma kate kuroo kʼa say-say sargari tonadogoo carawey bande kaŋ goo cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga.
Boraa ma hawoo fooru kʼa dunbu-dunbu.
Sargari juwalkaa Haruna izʼarey ma nuune daŋ sargari tonadogoo boŋ ka tuuri kanandi nuunaa boŋ.
Haruna izʼarey, sargari juwalkey ma ham dunbu-dunbantey, nda boŋoo, nda maanoo kanandi tuurey boŋ nuunaa ga kaŋ goo sargari tonadogoo boŋ.
A ma teeley nda kobsey ɲumay nda hari, sargari juwalkaa mʼi kul dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ. Sargari kukurante no, sargari tonante kaŋ sunnaaraa ga kan Abadantaa se.
Nda nga sargaroo si hun kala alman buuney ra ka tee sargari kukurante, a ma tee feeji wala hancin, aru kaŋ ga malal sii.
A mʼa koosu sargari tonadogoo hawsa caraa here hukkumoo tenje Abadantaa jine. Haruna izʼarey, sargari juwalkey ma kuroo say-say sargari tonadogoo carawey bande.
A mʼa dunbu-dunbu, boŋoo nda maanoo goo a ra. Sargari juwalkaa mʼi kanandi tuurey boŋ nuunaa ga kaŋ goo sargari tonadogoo boŋ.
A ma teeley nda kobsey ɲumay nda hari. Sargari juwalkaa mʼi kul dullandi kʼi sarga sargari tonadogoo boŋ. Sargari kukurante no, sargari tonante kaŋ sunnaaraa ga kan Abadantaa se.
Nda nga sargaroo si hun kala cirawey ra ka tee sargari kukurante Abadantaa se, a ma tee gubaguba wala tuuzun-ize.
Sargari juwalkaa mʼa sarga sargari tonadogoo boŋ, a ma boŋoo kaa kʼa dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ, de kuroo ma doorandi sargari tonadogoo caraa ga.
A ma zunduroo dogu, nga nda hayey kaŋ goo a ra
kʼi warra sargari tonadogoo jeroo ga, waynahunay here, nongoo kaŋ ra i ga boosey daŋ.

A ma fatawey nda cere game kottu bila i ma hun cere ga. Sargari juwalkaa mʼa dullandi sargari tonadogoo tuuroo boŋ kaŋ goo nuunaa ra. Sargari kukurante no, sargari tonante kaŋ sunnaaraa ga kan Abadantaa se.›»
«‹Nda boro ga baa ma taasu sargari tee Abadantaa maaɲoo ga, sargaroo ma tee farin hamni, a ma jii doori a boŋ ka dugu fur a ga.

A mʼa ka koy Haruna izʼarey se kaŋ ti sargari juwalkey. A ma nga kaboo too farin hamnoo ra kʼa haŋandi nda jii, nda dugoo kul. Sargari juwalkaa mʼa dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ sanda hongandihaya. Sargari tonante no kaŋ sunnaaraa ga kan Abadantaa se.
Taasu sargaroo cindoo, Haruna nda nga izʼarey ma duu a. Baa no kaŋ ga hanse ka henan, zama a mana hun kala sargari tonantey ra Abadantaa maaɲoo ga.
Nda nʼga baa ma taasu sargari kaa kaŋ tonandi alforon ra, a ma tee farin hamni, wijilayaŋ kaŋ loobandi nda jii bila dolobiri nda furmeyaŋ kaŋ yonandi nda jii bila dolobiri.
Nda ni taasu sargaroo mma tonandi guuru boŋ, a ma tee farin hamni kaŋ loobandi nda jii bila dolobiri.
Mʼa dunbu-dunbu ka jii doori a boŋ. Woo ti taasu sargari.
Nda ni taasu sargaroo mma tonandi pol ra, a ma tee nda farin hamni nda jii.
Ma koy nda taasu sargaroo kaŋ hansandi hayey wey ra Abadantaa do, i mʼa noo sargari juwalkaa se, a ma koy nda a sargari tonadogoo ra.
Sargari juwalkaa ma hayaa kaa sargaroo ra kaŋ ga tee hongandihaya, a mʼa dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ. Sargari tonante no kaŋ sunnaaraa ga kan Abadantaa se.
Taasu sargaroo cindoo, Haruna nda nga izʼarey ma duu a. Baa no kaŋ ga hanse ka henan, zama a mana hun kala sargari tonantey ra Abadantaa maaɲoo ga.
Taasu sargari kul kaŋ war gʼa tee Abadantaa maaɲoo ga, dolobiri si hima ka huru a ra. Abada dolobiri dumi kul wala yuu dumi kul masi huru war sargari tonantey ra Abadantaa maaɲoo ga.
Dumaray-ize jina-jinawey, war mʼi tee sargari Abadantaa maaɲoo ga, amma i masi tonandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ sanda sunnaara kaana.
Taasu sargari kul, ma ciiri fur a boŋ. Masi naŋ ciiroo ma kuma, zama ciiri ti amaanaa tammaasaa ni nda ni Koyoo game. Ma ciiri daŋ sargari kul ga.
Nda nʼga baa ma dumari-ize jina-jinawey tee sargari Abadantaa maaɲoo ga, mʼa tee nda jeeniyaŋ kaŋ kukurandi nuune ra, ma taasoo tutubu kʼa kaa, a ma tee ni dumaray-ize jina-jinawey taasu sargari.
Ma jii doori a boŋ ka dugu fur a ga. Woo ti taasu sargari.
Sargari juwalkaa ma taasu tutubantaa jere foo, nda jii, nda dugoo kul dullandi sanda hongandihaya. Sargari tonante no Abadantaa maaɲoo ga.›»
«‹Nda boro sargaroo si hun kala hawey ra ka tee alaafiya teendi sargaroo, nda aru no wala woy, a ma tee alman kaŋ ga malal sii, a mʼa ka koy Abadantaa jine.
A ma nga kaboo fur nga sargaroo boŋoo ga kʼa koosu cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga. Haruna izʼarey, sargari juwalkey ma kuroo say-say sargari tonadogoo carawey bande.
Alaafiya teendi sargaroo woo ra a ma nonguyaŋ kaa Abadantaa maaɲoo ga kʼi tee sargari tonante. Nongey ti: maanoo kaŋ ga teeley daabu, nda teeley maanoo kul,
nda dumay-ɲaa-guuri hinkaa, nda maanoo kaŋ gʼi daabu kaŋ ga koy hala caraa ga, nda tasa-izoo kaŋ goo tasaa ga, a mʼa kaa dumay-ɲaa-guurey bande.
Haruna izʼarey mʼi dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ nda sargari kukurantaa kaŋ goo nuunaa tuurey boŋ. Sargari tonante no kaŋ sunnaaraa ga kan Abadantaa se.
Nda nga sargaroo si hun kala alman buuney ra ka tee alaafiya teendi sargaroo Abadantaa maaɲoo ga, aru no wala woy, a ma tee alman kaŋ ga malal sii.
Nda boraa sargaroo ti feeji, a mʼa ka koy Abadantaa jine.
A ma nga kaboo fur sargaroo boŋoo ga kʼa koosu cere kubayyan hukkumoo jine. Haruna izʼarey ma kuroo say-say sargari tonadogoo carawey bande.

Alaafiya teendi sargaroo woo ra a ma maanoo nonguyaŋ kaa Abadantaa maaɲoo ga kʼi tee sargari tonante. Nongey ti: šuwalaa timmantaa, a mʼa kaa hala birigaaroo ga, nda maanoo kaŋ ga teeley daabu, nda teeley maanoo kul,
nda dumay-ɲaa-guuri hinkaa, nda maanoo kaŋ gʼi daabu kaŋ ga koy hala caraa ga, nda tasa-izoo kaŋ goo tasaa ga, a mʼa kaa dumay-ɲaa-guurey bande.
Sargari juwalkaa mʼi dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ. Ŋaayan no kaŋ tee sargari tonante Abadantaa maaɲoo ga.
Nda nga sargaroo ti hancin, boraa mʼa ka koy Abadantaa jine.
A ma nga kaboo fur almanoo boŋoo ga kʼa koosu cere kubayyan hukkumoo jine. Haruna izʼarey ma kuroo say-say sargari tonadogoo carawey bande.
Sargaroo woo ra a ma nonguyaŋ kaa Abadantaa maaɲoo ga kʼi tee sargari tonante. Nongey ti: maanoo kaŋ ga teeley daabu, nda teeley maanoo kul,
nda dumay-ɲaa-guuri hinkaa, nda maanoo kaŋ gʼi daabu kaŋ ga koy hala caraa ga, nda tasa-izoo kaŋ goo tasaa ga, a mʼa kaa dumay-ɲaa-guurey bande.
Sargari juwalkaa mʼi dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ. Ŋaayan no kaŋ tee sargari tonante kaŋ sunnaaraa ga kan. Maanoo kul ti Abadantaa wane.
Hantum kaŋ si tun ne war zamaney se, nongu kul kaŋ ra war goro: war masi maani kul ŋaa, war masi kuri kul ŋaa.›»
Abadantaa šelaŋ Musa se ka nee:
«Šelaŋ Izirayel borey se ka nee: ‹Nda boro firka ka zunubu tee ka yaamarey kul kaŋ ga bara affoo hoo kaŋ Abadantaa nʼa gay a masʼa tee, amma a na affoo hoo i ra,
nda sargari juwalkaa kaŋ yonandi
no ka zunuboo tee, de nga bande a na jamaa kaŋandi zunubu ra, nga zunuboo kaŋ a nʼa tee se, a ma haw yaaru kaŋ ga malal sii tee zunubu sargari Abadantaa maaɲoo ga.
A ma haw yaaroo ka koy cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga Abadantaa jine. A ma nga kaboo fur haw yaaroo boŋoo ga, a mʼa koosu Abadantaa jine.
Sargari juwalkaa kaŋ yonandi
ma zaa haw yaaroo kuroo ra kʼa ka koy cere kubayyan hukkumoo do.
A ma nga kabe-izoo sufa kuroo ra kʼa say-say cee iyye Abadantaa jine, nongu henanantaa ridowoo jine.

A ma zaa kuroo ra kʼa daŋ dugu hew kaaney diinandidogoo hilley ga kaŋ goo Abadantaa jine, cere kubayyan hukkumoo ra. A ma haw yaaroo kuroo cindoo kul doori sargari kukurantey tonadogoo gandahere kaŋ goo cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga.
A ma zunubu sargaroo haw yaaroo maanoo kul kaa, maanoo kaŋ ga teeley daabu nda maanoo kul kaŋ goo teeley ga,
nda dumay-ɲaa-guuri hinkaa, nda maanoo kaŋ gʼi daabu kaŋ ga koy hala caraa ga, nda tasa-izoo kaŋ goo tasaa ga, a mʼa kaa dumay-ɲaa-guurey bande,
sanda takaa kaŋ nda i gʼi kaa alaafiya teendi sargaroo haw yaaroo ra. Sargari juwalkaa mʼi dullandi sargari kukurantey tonadogoo boŋ.
Amma haw yaaroo kuuroo, nda nga bašoo kul, nda boŋoo, nda kobsey, nda teeley nda ngi žiiboo,
haw yaaru timmantaa, a mʼa ka koy jamaa kaloo se taray nongu henanante kaŋ ra i ga boosey mun, de a mʼa ton tuuri nuune boŋ, nongoo kaŋ ra i ga boosey mun ra a ga tonandi.›»
«‹Nda Izirayel jamaa kul firka ka zunubu tee bila nda i ma bay, de i na yaamarey kul kaŋ ga bara affoo hoo kaŋ Abadantaa nʼi gay i masʼa tee, i duu zunubu.
Waati kaŋ zunuboo kaŋ i nʼa tee ka yaamaroo hoo bayrandi, jamaa ma haw yaaru kaa zunubu sargari, de i mʼa ka koy cere kubayyan hukkumoo jine.
Jamaa boro beerey ma ngi kabey fur haw yaaroo boŋoo ga Abadantaa jine, de affoo i ra mʼa koosu jinoo ra.
Sargari juwalkaa kaŋ yonandi
ma zaa haw yaaroo kuroo ra ka kate nda a cere kubayyan hukkumoo ra.
A ma nga kabe-izoo sufa kuroo ra kʼa say-say cee iyye Abadantaa jine, ridowoo ga.

A ma zaa kuroo ra kʼa daŋ sargari tonadogoo hilley ga Abadantaa jine, cere kubayyan hukkumoo ra. A ma kuroo cindoo kul doori sargari kukurantey tonadogoo cewey ga kaŋ goo cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga.
A ma maanoo kul kaa kʼa dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ.
A ma haw yaaroo tee sanda takaa kaŋ a nʼa tee zunubu sargaroo haw yaaroo se. Woo no a mʼa tee a se. Sargari juwalkaa ma zunubu tuusuyanoo tee i se, de i ga yaafandi.
A ma haw yaaroo ka fatta ka koy jamaa kaloo se taray kʼa ton sanda takaa kaŋ nda a na ijinaa ton. Zunubu sargari no jamaa se.›»
«‹Nda boŋkoyni na zunubu tee ka firka ka yaamarey kul kaŋ ga bara affoo hoo kaŋ Abadantaa, nga Koyoo nʼa gay a masʼa tee, a duu zunubu.
Nda a bay zunuboo ga kaŋ nga nʼa tee, a ma hancin kaa sargari, aru kaŋ ga malal sii.
A ma nga kaboo fur hancinoo boŋoo ga, a mʼa koosu nongoo kaŋ ra i ga sargari kukurantey almaney koosu Abadantaa jine. Zunubu sargari no.
Sargari juwalkaa ma nga kabe-izoo ka zaa zunubu sargaroo kuroo ra, a mʼa daŋ sargari kukurantey tonadogoo hilley ga, a ma kuroo cindoo doori sargari kukurantey tonadogoo gandahere.
A ma maanoo kul dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ sanda alaafiya teendi sargaroo maanoo. Sargari juwalkaa ma zunubu tuusuyanoo tee boŋkoynoo se nga zunuboo se, de a ga yaafandi.›»
«‹Nda gandaa ra, jamaa boro foo na zunubu tee ka firka ka yaamarey affoo hoo kaŋ Abadantaa nʼa gay a masʼa tee, a duu zunubu.
Nda a bay nga zunuboo ga kaŋ nga nʼa tee, a ma hancin woy kaŋ ga malal sii kaa sargari nga zunubu kaŋ a nʼa tee se.
A ma nga kaboo fur zunubu sargaroo almanoo boŋoo ga, a mʼa koosu nongoo kaŋ ra i ga sargari kukurantey almaney koosu.
Sargari juwalkaa ma nga kabe-izoo ka zaa kuroo ra, a mʼa daŋ sargari kukurantey tonadogoo hilley ga, a ma kuroo cindoo kul doori sargari tonadogoo gandahere.

A ma maanoo kul kaa, sanda takaa kaŋ nda i ga alaafiya teendi sargaroo maanoo kaa, a mʼa dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ, a ga tee sunnaara kaana Abadantaa se. Sargari juwalkaa ma zunubu tuusuyanoo tee a se, de a ga yaafandi.
Nda feeji no a kate a ma tee zunubu sargari, a ma tee woy kaŋ ga malal sii.
A ma nga kaboo fur zunubu sargaroo almanoo boŋoo ga, a mʼa koosu kʼa tee zunubu sargari, nongoo kaŋ ra i ga sargari kukurantey almaney koosu.
Sargari juwalkaa ma nga kabe-izoo zaa zunubu sargaroo kuroo ra, a mʼa daŋ sargari kukurantey tonadogoo hilley ga, a ma kuroo cindoo kul doori sargari tonadogoo gandahere.

A ma maanoo kul kaa, sanda takaa kaŋ nda i ga alaafiya teendi sargaroo feejoo maanoo kaa, a mʼa dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ sargari tonantey bande Abadantaa maaɲoo ga. Sargari juwalkaa ma zunubu tuusuyanoo tee a se nga zunuboo se kaŋ a nʼa tee, de a ga yaafandi.›»
«‹Nda boro maa dangayan, a dii hayaa kaŋ se dangayanoo teendi wala a bay, a ga tee seede, nda a wanji kʼa har, a na zunubu tee, a ga nga layboo zaa.

Boro kaŋ tuku haya kul kaŋ no ga kaŋ ga harram, a ma tee hooga jifa harramante, wala adabba biirante jifa harramante, wala gandako jifa harramante, ba nda a mana bay, boraa hunday žiibi, a duu zunubu.
Wala mo boro, nda a tuku adamize žiibi ga, a ma tee žiibi dumi kul kaŋ no kaŋ ga boro žiibandi, ba nda a mana bay, nda a kaa ka bay, a duu zunubu.
Boro kaŋ goo ma šelaŋ bila nda lakkal hala a žee, haya kul kaŋ ga no, a ma tee ihenna wala ifutu, ba nda a mana bay, nda a kaa ka bay, a duu zunubey wey affoo.
Boro kaŋ duu zunubey wey affoo, a ma hayaa har kaŋ zunuboo no a nʼa tee.

Woo banda ga, a ma nga tooɲe sargaroo noo Abadantaa maaɲoo ga, nga zunuboo kaŋ a nʼa tee maaganda se alman buuna woy, maanaa feeji woy wala hancin woy, no ma tee zunubu sargari. Woo ga, sargari juwalkaa ma zunubu tuusuyanoo tee a se nga zunuboo se.›»

«‹Nda boro hinoo si too alman buuna kʼa sarga zunuboo kaŋ a nʼa tee se, a ma kate gubaguba hinka wala tuuzun-ize hinka Abadantaa maaɲoo ga kʼi tee tooɲe sargari, affoo ma tee zunubu sargari, affaa ma tee sargari kukurante.
A ma kate ey sargari juwalkaa se, zunuboo wanoo, a mʼa kaa sargari jina, a ma boŋoo kaa jindoo ga bila nda a mʼa dogu.
Sargari juwalkaa ma zaa zunubu sargaroo ciraa kuroo ra kʼa say-say sargari tonadogoo caraa ga, de kuroo cindoo ma doorandi sargari tonadogoo gandahere, zunubu sargari no.
Ciraw hinkantoo, a mʼa tee sargari kukurante sanda takaa kaŋ nda fondaa nʼa har. Sargari juwalkaa ma zunubu tuusuyanoo tee a se nga zunuboo se kaŋ a nʼa tee, de a ga yaafandi.

Nda boraa kaŋ na zunubu tee hinoo si too gubaguba hinka wala tuuzun-ize hinka, a ma farin hamni kilo hinza sarga, a ma tee zunubu sargari. A masi jii doori a boŋ, a masi dugu fur a ga, zama zunubu sargari no.

A mʼa ka koy sargari juwalkaa do, sargari juwalkaa ma nga kaboo too zanboo ra kaŋ ga tee hongandihaya kʼa dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ, nga nda sargari tonantey Abadantaa maaɲoo ga, zunubu sargari no.
Sargari juwalkaa ma zunubu tuusuyanoo tee a se nga zunuboo se kaŋ a nʼa tee ka yaamarey wey affoo hoo, de a ga yaafandi. Woo kaŋ cindi, sargari juwalkaa ma duu a sanda taasu sargaroo.›»
Abadantaa šelaŋ Musa se ka nee:

«Nda boro firka ka tooɲe ka zunubu tee ka hayey kaŋ jisandi Abadantaa maaɲoo ga dii, a ma tooɲe sargari tee Abadantaa maaɲoo ga ka feeji gaaru zaa alman buuney ra kaŋ ga malal sii kaŋ alkadaroo kaŋ kayandi ga too nzorfu kaaray tammaa alkadaroo, a ma sawa nda nongu henanantaa nzorfu tammaa. Almanoo ma tee tooɲe sargari.

Tooɲaa kaŋ a nʼa tee nongu henanantaa se, a mʼa hanse ka hayaa yeeti ka affoo tonton igguu foo kul ga, a mʼa noo sargari juwalkaa se. Sargari juwalkaa ma zunubu tuusuyanoo tee a se nda nga feeji gaaroo kʼa sarga kʼa tee tooɲe sargari, de a ga yaafandi.
Nda boro kaŋ na zunubu tee ka yaamarey kul kaŋ ga bara affoo hoo kaŋ Abadantaa nʼa gay a masʼa tee bila nda a ma bay, a duu zunubu, de a ga nga layboo zaa.

A ma feeji gaaru kaŋ ga malal sii zaa alman buuney ra kaŋ nga alkadaroo kaŋ kayandi ga too, a ma tooɲe sargari tee kʼa ka koy sargari juwalkaa do. Sargari juwalkaa ma firkayanoo kaŋ boraa nʼa tee bila nda a ma bay zunubu tuusuyanoo tee a se, de a ga yaafandi.
Tooɲe sargari no, zama boraa din, šikka sii a duu zunubu Abadantaa do.»
Abadantaa šelaŋ Musa se ka nee:
«Boro kaŋ na zunubu tee ka Abadantaa tooɲe ka nga gandaa boro zanba jinay jisante ga, a nka nondi a se wala zaytaray jinay no, wala a nka nga gandaa boro kom,
wala a na haya kurma kaŋ dere, de a na yankar, wala a žee taari ga, zunubey kul kaŋ adamize gʼi tee, affoo ga,
waati kaŋ boraa na zunuboo woo tee, a tooɲe, a ma jinaa kaŋ a nʼa zay, wala a nʼa kom, wala jinay no kaŋ i nʼa talfi a ga, wala a nka haya derante kurma, a mʼa yeeti.
Wala mo a ma tee haya kul kaŋ ga a taari ka žee. A mʼa yeeti a ga timme, ka affoo tonton igguu foo kul ga kʼa noo koyoo se, zaaroo kaŋ ra a ga tooɲe sargaroo kaa.

Woo banda ga, a ma kate nga tooɲe sargaroo Abadantaa maaɲoo ga: a ma koy nda sargari juwalkaa se feeji gaaru kaŋ ga malal sii kaŋ nga alkadaroo ga too, a ma tee tooɲe sargari, a mʼa kaa alman buuney ra.
Sargari juwalkaa ma zunubu tuusuyanoo tee a se Abadantaa jine, de tooɲe dumi kul kaŋ no a nʼa tee ka duu zunubu ga yaafandi.»
Abadantaa šelaŋ Musa se ka nee:

«Haruna nda nga izʼarey yaamar ka nee: ‹Sargari kukurante ašariyaa ne: sargari kukurantaa, nga, a ma cindi sargari tonadogoo denjoo daŋdogoo ra cijinoo kul hala moo ma boo, sargari tonadogoo nuunaa ma cindi ka dii a boŋ.

Woo banda ga, sargari juwalkaa ma nga leŋ šukka kaayi beeroo daŋ, de a ma nga leŋ šukka npogaa daŋ nga ga. A ma sargari kukurantaa kaŋ nuunaa nʼa ton sargari tonadogoo boŋ boosoo zaa kʼa daŋ sargari tonadogoo jeroo ga.
Woo banda ga, a ma nga darbawey kaa ka darbay fooyaŋ daŋ. A ma boosoo ka koy jamaa kaloo se taray nongu ra kaŋ ga henan.
Nuunaa ma cindi ka dii sargari tonadogoo boŋ, a masi buu. Sargari juwalkaa ma tuurey diinandi a boŋ, subbaahi kul ka sargari kukurantaa hanse, ka alaafiya teendi sargarey maaney dullandi.
Nuunaa ga hima ka dii sargari tonadogoo boŋ alwaati kul, a masi buu.
Taasu sargaroo ašariyaa ne: Haruna izʼarey mʼa sarga Abadantaa jine, sargari tonadogoo tenje.

A ma nga kaboo too taasu sargaroo hamni baanaa ra, nda nga jiyoo ra, nda dugoo kul kaŋ goo taasu sargaroo ga. A mʼa dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ. Sargari no kaŋ sunnaaraa ga kan, nga hongandihayaa no Abadantaa maaɲoo ga.
Woo kaŋ ga cindi a ra, Haruna nda nga izʼarey mʼa ŋaa, a ma ŋandi bila dolobiri, nongu henanante ra. I mʼa ŋaa cere kubayyan hukkumoo batumaa ra.
A masi hinandi nda dolobiri. Ngi bagaa no kaŋ ay nʼa noo i se sargari tonantey ra. Haya no kaŋ ga hanse ka henan, sanda zunubu sargari nda sanda tooɲe sargari.
Aru kul kaŋ goo Haruna izey ra mʼa ŋaa. Yaamar kaŋ si tun no war zamaney se, sargari tonantey here Abadantaa maaɲoo ga. Haya kul kaŋ tuku a ga, ga yeetandi jere ga Irkoy se.›»
Abadantaa yee ka šelaŋ Musa se ka nee:
«Sargaroo ne kaŋ Haruna nda nga izʼarey mʼa kaa Abadantaa maaɲoo ga hanoo kaŋ i gʼa yon
: farin hamni kilo hinza kaŋ ga tee taasu sargari alwaati kul, jere foo subbaahoo, jere faa cijinoo ra.
Hamnoo ma hansandi guuru boŋ nda jii. Ma kate a, a ɲaami nda jii. Ma taasu sargaroo kaa a ma tee dunbu-dunbante kaŋ sunnaaraa ga kan Abadantaa se.
Haruna izʼarey ra, sargari juwalkaa kaŋ ga yonandi ka huru dogoo ra ma sargaroo woo tee. Yaamar kaŋ si tun no, a kul ma dullandi Abadantaa maaɲoo ga.
Sargari juwalkaw taasu sargaroo kul ma tonandi hala a ma ben, a masi ŋandi.»
Abadantaa yee ka šelaŋ Musa se ka nee:

«Šelaŋ Haruna nda nga izʼarey se ka nee: ‹Zunubu sargaroo ašariyaa ne: nongoo kaŋ ra i ga sargari kukurantaa almanoo koosu, nga ra i ma zunubu sargaroo almanoo koosu Abadantaa jine. Haya no kaŋ ga hanse ka henan.
Sargari juwalkaa kaŋ ga sargaroo kaa zunuboo se mʼa ŋaa, nongu henanante ra a ma ŋandi, cere kubayyan hukkumoo batumaa ra.
Haya kul kaŋ tuku hamoo ga, ga henan. Nda kuroo ra haya say darbay ga, hayaa kaŋ ga a say mʼa ɲumandi nongu henanante ra.
Labu kusoo kaŋ ra a hinandi ma kayrandi. Nda alhan kusu ra a hinandi, a ma žiirandi ka leelandi nda hari.
Aru kul kaŋ goo sargari juwalkey hugey borey ra mʼa ŋaa. Haya no kaŋ ga hanse ka henan.
Amma zunubu sargari kul kaŋ kuroo ra haya katandi cere kubayyan hukkumoo ra nongu henanantaa ra zunubu tuusuyanoo se masi ŋandi. A ma tonandi nuune ra ka tee boosu.›»
«‹Tooɲe sargaroo ašariyaa ne: haya no kaŋ ga hanse ka henan.
Nongoo kaŋ ra i ga sargari kukurantaa almanoo koosu, nga ra i ma tooɲe sargaroo almanoo koosu, kuroo ma say-sayandi sargari tonadogoo carawey bande.
Sargari juwalkaa ma maanoo kul sarga, nda šuwalaa, nda maanoo kaŋ ga teeley daabu,
nda dumay-ɲaa-guuri hinkaa, nda maanoo kaŋ gʼi daabu kaŋ ga koy hala caraa ga, nda tasa-izoo kaŋ goo tasaa ga, a mʼa kaa dumay-ɲaa-guurey bande.
Sargari juwalkaa mʼi dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ sanda sargari tonante Abadantaa maaɲoo ga, tooɲe sargari no.
Aru kul kaŋ goo sargari juwalkey hugey borey ra mʼa ŋaa. Nongu henanante ra a ma ŋandi. Haya no kaŋ ga hanse ka henan.
Takaa kaŋ ti zunubu sargaroo, nga da ti tooɲe sargaroo, ašariyaa follokaa bara i se. Sargari juwalkaa kaŋ ga zunubu tuusuyanoo tee, nga no ma duu a.
Sargari juwalkaa kaŋ na boro sargari kukurantaa tee, sargari kukurantaa kaŋ a nʼa kaa kuuroo, sargari juwalkaa no ma duu a, nga wane nda a.
Taasu sargari kul kaŋ ga hinandi alforon ra wala haya kul kaŋ ga hansandi pol ra wala guuru boŋ, sargari juwalkaa kaŋ gʼa tee, nga no ma duu a.
Taasu sargari kul kaŋ loobandi nda jii wala bila jii, Haruna izʼarey, ngi no ma duu a, i kul ma sawa a ra.›»
«‹Alaafiya teendi sargarey kaŋ ga teendi Abadantaa maaɲoo ga ašariyaa ne:

nda boro nʼa kaa albarka daŋyan se, a mʼa tee wijilayaŋ kaŋ ra dolobiri sii kaŋ loobandi nda jii, nda furmeyaŋ kaŋ ra dolobiri sii kaŋ yonandi nda jii, nda farin hamni kaŋ ɲaami nda jii ka tee wijila kaŋ loobandi nda jii albarka daŋyanoo kaŋ ti alaafiya teendi sargaroo bande.
Nga albarka daŋyan sargaroo bande a ma furme tunanteyaŋ kaa alaafiya teendi sargaroo.
Sargarey wey ra, dumi foo kul nongu foo ga hun Abadantaa maaɲoo ga, sargari juwalkaa kaŋ na alaafiya teendi sargaroo kuroo say-say, nga no ma duu a.
Nga albarka daŋyanoo kaŋ ti alaafiya teendi sargaroo hamoo ma ŋandi hanoo hunday kaŋ a nʼa kaa, haya kul masi cindi hala suba subbaahoo ra.
Nda boraa sargaroo manʼti kala meefur wala sargari kaŋ a gʼa kaa nda nga boŋ, nga sargaroo ma ŋandi zaaroo kaŋ a gʼa kaa, woo kaŋ ga cindi a ra ma ŋandi subaa ra.
Woo kaŋ ga cindi sargaroo hamoo ra jirbi hinzantoo hane ma tonandi nuune ra ka tee boosu.
Nda alaafiya teendi sargaroo hamoo ra haya ŋandi jirbi hinzantoo hane, sargaroo si taandi, boraa kaŋ nʼa kaa, a si duu nga nafaa, haya hasarante no, boro kaŋ nʼa ŋaa ga nga layboo zaa.
Hamoo kaŋ too haya do kaŋ ga harram masi ŋandi, a ma tonandi nuune ra ka tee boosu. Hamoo hunday, boro kul kaŋ ga henan gʼa ŋaa.
Amma boro kaŋ na alaafiya teendi sargaroo hamoo ŋaa kaŋ ti Abadantaa wane, nga žiiboo goo a ga, boraa din ga hun nga jamaa ra.

Nda boro tuku haya kul kaŋ no ga kaŋ ga harram, adamize žiibi, wala alman harramante, wala haya wangante kul kaŋ ga harram, de a na alaafiya teendi sargaroo hamoo ŋaa kaŋ ti Abadantaa wane, boraa din ga hun nga jamaa ra.›»
Abadantaa šelaŋ Musa se ka nee:
«Šelaŋ Izirayel borey se ka nee: ‹War masi haw, wala feeji, wala hancin kul maanoo ŋaa.
Jifa wala adabba kaŋ hooga nʼa wii maanoo ga hin ka yantasu hanse, amma war masʼa ŋaa kul.
Zama boro kul kaŋ na alman maanoo ŋaa kaŋ ga tee sargari tonante Abadantaa maaɲoo ga, boraa kaŋ nʼa ŋaa ga hun nga jamaa ra.
War masi kuri kul ŋaa, nongu kul kaŋ ra war goro, a ma tee ciraw kuri wala alman kuri.
Boro kul kaŋ na kuri kul kaŋ no ŋaa, boraa din ga hun nga jamaa ra.›»
Abadantaa yee ka šelaŋ Musa se ka nee:
«Šelaŋ Izirayel borey se ka nee: ‹Boro kaŋ na nga alaafiya teendi sargaroo daŋ Abadantaa jine, a ma Abadantaa bagaa kaŋ nda a ga hima kaa nga alaafiya teendi sargaroo ra.
Nga kaboo ma kate sargari tonantey Abadantaa maaɲoo ga. A ma kate maanoo nda caraa kʼa zinji sanda sargari zinji-zinjante Abadantaa jine.
Sargari juwalkaa ma maanoo dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ. Caraa, Haruna nda nga izʼarey ma duu a.
War alaafiya teendi sargarey ra, war ma almanoo cee hennaa noo sargari juwalkaa se.
Haruna izʼarey ra, boro kaŋ ga alaafiya teendi sargaroo kuroo nda maanoo sarga no ma duu almanoo cee hennaa sanda nga bagaa.
Gandoo kaŋ hun sargari zinji-zinjantaa ra nda cewoo kaŋ hun sargaroo ra kaŋ i nʼa kaa, ay nʼi zaa Izirayel borey do kʼi noo sargari juwalkaa Haruna nda nga izʼarey se sanda yaamar kaŋ si tun.›»
Woo ti bagaa kaŋ Haruna nda nga izʼarey ga duu a ngi yonyanoo se sargari tonantey ra Abadantaa maaɲoo ga, za hanoo kaŋ i ga man ka ngi sargari juwalyan goyoo tee Abadantaa maaɲoo ga.
Hayaa no kaŋ Abadantaa nʼa zaa Izirayel borey do kʼi yaamar hanoo kaŋ ra a nʼi yon. Hantum kaŋ si tun no ngi zamaney se.
Woo ti sargari kukurantaa, nda taasu sargaroo, nda zunubu sargaroo, nda tooɲe sargaroo, nda sargari juwalkaa gorandiyanoo goyoo ra sargaroo, nda alaafiya teendi sargaroo ašariyaa
kaŋ Abadantaa na Musa yaamar Sinay tondi hondoo boŋ, Sinay saajoo ra hanoo kaŋ ra a na Izirayel borey yaamar i ma sargariyaŋ kaa nga maaɲoo ga.
Abadantaa šelaŋ Musa se ka nee:
«Haruna zaa, nga nda nga izʼarey, nda darbawey, nda yonyan jiyoo, nda zunubu sargaroo haw yaaroo, nda feeji gaaru hinkaa, nda takulawey kaŋ ra dolobiri sii dikaa.
Ma alžamaa kul cee cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga.»
Hayaa kaŋ Abadantaa nʼa yaamar, Musa nʼa tee, alžamaa marga cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga.
Musa nee alžamaa se: «Hayaa ne kaŋ Abadantaa yaamar a ma teendi.»
Woo banda ga, Musa na Haruna nda nga izʼarey manandi kʼi ɲumay nda hari.

A na kaayoo daŋ Haruna ga, a na centoo haw nda gamahawoo, a na forkiyaa daŋ a ga, a na beene kaayi-izoo kaŋ ga kotay kaayoo ga daŋ a ga, a na gamahawoo haw nda kaayi-izoo gamahawoo kʼa kuubi kʼa bere.
A na albaytoo daŋ gandey ga ka alkurraa goy jinawey kaŋ ti Urim nda Tumim daŋ albaytoo ra.
A na fatalaa didiji boŋoo ga, de fatalaa jineheroo ga, a na wura hiiri henanantaa daŋ, sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
Woo banda ga, Musa na yonyan jiyoo zaa ka Irkoy gorodogoo nda haya kul kaŋ goo a ra yon kʼi daŋ jere ga Irkoy se.
A zaa a ra ka say-saya cee iyye sargari tonadogoo ga, a na sargari tonadogoo, nda nga jinawey kul, nda hanfi beeroo nda hayaa kaŋ ga a ga goro yon kʼi daŋ jere ga Irkoy se.
A na yonyan jiyoo doori Haruna boŋoo boŋ, a nʼa yon kʼa daŋ jere ga Irkoy se.
Musa na Haruna izʼarey manandi, a na kaayi beeriyaŋ daŋ i ga, a na centey haw nda gamahaw, a na fuula daŋ i ga sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
A na zunubu sargaroo haw yaaroo manandi, Haruna nda nga izʼarey na ngi kabey fur zunubu sargaroo haw yaaroo boŋoo ga.

A koosandi, Musa na nga kabe-izoo ka zaa kuroo ra kʼa daŋ sargari tonadogoo hilley ga, carawey bande, a na sargari tonadogoo henanandi, a na kuroo cindoo doori sargari tonadogoo gandahere kʼa daŋ jere ga Irkoy se ka zunubu tuusuyanoo tee a se.
A na maanoo kul kaŋ ga teeley daabu, nda tasa-izoo, nda dumay-ɲaa-guuri hinkaa, nda ngi maanoo zaa kʼi dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ.
Yaaroo, nda kuuroo, nda hamoo, nda žiiboo, a nʼi ton nuune ra jamaa kaloo se taray kʼi tee boosu, sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
A na sargari kukurantaa feeji gaaroo manandi, Haruna nda nga izʼarey na kabe fur feejoo boŋoo ga.
A koosandi, Musa na kuroo say-say sargari tonadogoo carawey bande.
Feejoo dunbu-dunbandi, Musa na boŋoo, nda ham dunbu-dunbantey, nda maaney dullandi.

Teeley nda kobsey ɲumandi nda hari, Musa na feeji gaaroo kul dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ: sargari kukurante no kaŋ sunnaaraa ga kan, sargari tonante no Abadantaa maaɲoo ga sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
Woo banda ga, Musa na feeji gaaru hinkantoo manandi, sargari juwalkaa gorandiyanoo goyoo ra feeji gaaroo kaŋ ga tee sargari no. Haruna nda nga izʼarey na ngi kabey fur feeji gaaroo boŋoo ga.
A koosandi, Musa zaa kuroo ra, a nʼa daŋ Haruna haŋa hennaa deenoo ga, a daŋ nga kabe hennaa kobaaroo ga nda nga cee hennaa cew-ize beeroo ga.

Musa na Haruna izʼarey manandi, a zaa kuroo ra kʼa daŋ ngi haŋa hennaa deeney ga, a daŋ ngi kabe hennaa kobaarey ga nda ngi cee hennaa cew-ize beerey ga. Woo banda ga, Musa na kuroo cindoo say-say sargari tonadogoo carawey bande.
A na maanoo, nda šuwalaa, nda maanoo kul kaŋ ga teeley daabu, nda tasa-izoo, nda dumay-ɲaa-guuri hinkaa nda ngi maanoo, nda cee hennaa zaa.
Takulawey kaŋ ra dolobiri sii dikaa kaŋ ga jisi Abadantaa jine ra, a na wijila, nda wijila takula foo kaŋ loobandi nda jii, nda furme foo zaa a ra kʼi daŋ maaney nda cee hennaa ga.
A na wey kul daŋ Haruna nda nga izʼarey kabey ra, a nʼi zinji sanda sargari zinji-zinjante Abadantaa jine.

Woo banda ga, Musa nʼi kaa kabey ra, a nʼi dullandi sargari tonadogoo ga sargari kukurantaa boŋ kʼi tee sargari juwalkaa gorandiyanoo goyoo ra sargari, sargari tonante no kaŋ sunnaaraa ga kan Abadantaa se.
Musa na almanoo caraa zaa kʼa zinji sanda sargari zinji-zinjante Abadantaa jine, sargari juwalkaa gorandiyanoo goyoo ra feejoo woo, nga ti Musa bagaa sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa nʼa yaamar.

Musa na yonyan jiyoo zaa, nda kuroo kaŋ goo sargari tonadogoo boŋ, a say-saya Haruna nda nga darbawey ga, nga izʼarey nda ngi darbawey ga a bande, a na Haruna nda nga darbawey, nda nga izʼarey nda ngi darbawey a bande daŋ jere ga Irkoy goyoo se.

Woo banda ga, Musa nee Haruna nda nga izʼarey se: «Wa hamoo hina cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga, war mʼa ŋaa no din, nga nda takulaa kaŋ goo sargari juwalkaa gorandiyanoo goyoo ra dikaa ra sanda takaa kaŋ nda ay yaamar ka nee: ‹Haruna nda nga izʼarey mʼi ŋaa.›
Hamoo nda takulaa cindoo, war mʼi ton nuune ra kʼi tee boosu.

Woo banda ga, jirbi iyye war si hun cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga, hala han kaŋ war daŋyanoo jere ga zaarey ma timme, zama jirbi iyye no war gʼa tee hala war daŋyanoo jere ga Irkoy goyoo se ga tabati.
Hayaa kaŋ ir nʼa tee hõ, Abadantaa nʼa yaamar, hala war ma duu zunubu tuusuyan.
War ma cindi jirbi iyye cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga cijin nda zaari, war ma hayaa dii kaŋ Abadantaa nʼa noo war se war mʼa dii hala war masi duu ka buu, zama woo ti hayaa kaŋ nda ay yaamarandi.»
Haruna nda nga izʼarey na hayey kul tee kaŋ Abadantaa na Musa kʼi yaamar.
Jirbi yaahantoo hane, Musa na Haruna, nda nga izʼarey, nda Izirayel boro beerey cee.
A nee Haruna se: «Yagaw zaa zunubu sargaroo se, nda feeji gaaru sargari kukurantaa se kaŋ ga malal sii, ma kate ey Abadantaa jine.
Ma šelaŋ Izirayel borey se ka nee: ‹Wa jindaaru zaa zunubu sargaroo se, wa yagaw, nda feeji-ize kaŋyaŋ goo nda jiiri foo zaa, malal masi bara i ra, sargari kukurantaa se.
Ma haw yaaru nda feeji gaaru zaa alaafiya teendi sargaroo se kʼa kaa Abadantaa jine nda taasu sargari kaŋ loobandi nda jii, zama hõ Abadantaa ga bangay war se.›»
Hayey kaŋ nda Musa nʼi yaamar, i nʼi zaa kate cere kubayyan hukkumoo jine, alžamaa kul man kate ka kay Abadantaa jine.
Musa nee: «Hayaa ne kaŋ Abadantaa nʼa yaamar war mʼa tee, de Abadantaa daržaa ga bangay war se.»

Musa nee Haruna se: «Man sargari tonadogoo, ma ni zunubu sargaroo nda ni sargari kukurantaa kaa, ma zunubu tuusuyanoo tee ni nda jamaa se. Woo banda ga, ma jamaa sargaroo kaa, ma zunubu tuusuyanoo tee i se sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na yaamar.»
Haruna man kate sargari tonadogoo do, a na yagaa koosu kaŋ ti nga boŋ zunubu sargaroo.
Haruna izʼarey kate a se kuroo, a na kabe-izoo sufa kuroo ra, a nʼa daŋ sargari tonadogoo hilley ga, a na kuroo cindoo doori sargari tonadogoo gandahere.
A na zunubu sargari maanoo, nda dumay-ɲaa-guurey, nda tasa-izoo kaŋ hun tasaa ga dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
Amma bašoo nda kuuroo, a nʼi ton nuune ra jamaa kaloo se taray kʼi tee boosu.
Haruna na feeji gaaroo koosu sargari kukurantaa se. Nga izʼarey nʼa noo kuroo, a nʼa say-say sargari tonadogoo carawey bande.
I nʼa noo sargari kukurantaa kaŋ dunbu-dunbandi, nda boŋoo, de a nʼi dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ.
A na teeley nda kobsey ɲumay kʼi dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ, sargari kukurantaa boŋ.
Woo banda ga, a kate jamaa sargaroo: a na zunubu sargaroo jindaaroo dii kaŋ hun jamaa se, a nʼa koosu kʼa tee zunubu sargari, sanda cee jinaa takaa.
A kate sargari kukurantaa, a nʼa tee sanda takaa kaŋ fondaa nee.
A kate taasu sargaroo, a na nga kaboo too a ra, a nʼa dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ ka tonton subbaahoo sargari kukurantaa ga.
A na alaafiya teendi sargaroo haw yaaroo nda feeji gaaroo koosu kaŋ hun jamaa se. Nga izʼarey nʼa noo kuroo, a nʼa say-say sargari tonadogoo carawey bande.
I nʼa noo haw yaaroo nda feeji gaaroo maaney, nda šuwalaa, nda hayaa kaŋ ga teeley daabu, nda dumay-ɲaa-guurey, nda tasa-izoo.
I na maaney daŋ carawey ga, i na maaney dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ.
Haruna na carawey nda kabe hennaa zinji kʼi tee sargari zinji-zinjante Abadantaa jine sanda takaa kaŋ nda Musa nʼa yaamar.
Haruna na nga kabey šerre jamaa here ka gaara i se. Woo banda ga, kaŋ a na zunubu sargaroo nda sargari kukurantaa nda alaafiya teendi sargaroo kaa ka ben, a zunbu ganda.
Musa nda Haruna huru cere kubayyan hukkumoo ra. Kaŋ i fatta, i gaara jamaa se, de Abadantaa daržaa bangay alžamaa kul se.
Nuune hun Abadantaa do ka sargari kukurantaa nda maaney ton sargari tonadogoo boŋ. Jamaa kul dii a, i kaati nda ɲaali, i na ngi ndumey ka sujudu.
Haruna izʼarey, Nadab nda Abihu, affoo kul na nga dugu canboo zaa, i na nuune daŋ a ra ka dugu fur a boŋ, i na nuune kaŋ si bisa i se daŋ Abadantaa jine kaŋ a manʼi yaamar nda a.
Nuune hun Abadantaa do, a nʼi halaci, i buu Abadantaa jine.
Musa nee Haruna se: «Woo ti hayaa kaŋ Abadantaa nʼa har ka nee:
‹Borey kaŋ ga too kate ay do, ay ma henanandi i do.
Jamaa kul jine ya jeerandi.›»
Woo banda ga, Haruna dangay.
Musa ciya Mišel nda Elisafaŋ se, Uziyel izʼarey, Haruna baaba armaa, ka nee i se: «Wa man kate ka war armey kaa nongu henanantaa jine kʼi ka koy jamaa kaloo se taray.»
I man kate, de i nʼi ka koy ngi kaayi beerey ra gorodogoo se taray sanda takaa kaŋ nda Musa nʼa har.

Musa nee Haruna, nda nga izʼarey Eleyazar, nda Itamar se: «War masi war boŋey feeri, war masi war kaayey kottu ka war binemarayyanoo cebe hala war masi duu ka buu, hala Irkoy masi futu jamaa kul ga. Amma war armey, Izirayel hugoo kul ma borey hẽe kaŋ Abadantaa nʼi ton.
War masi hun cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga hala war masi duu ka buu, zama Abadantaa yonyan jiyoo goo war ga ka war daŋ jere ga nga se.» I na hayaa tee kaŋ Musa nʼa har.
Abadantaa šelaŋ Haruna se ka nee:
«War masi alaneb hari moora haŋ, war masi harifutu haŋ, ni nda ni izʼarey ni bande, waati kaŋ war ga koy huru cere kubayyan hukkumoo ra hala war masi duu ka buu. Hantum kaŋ si tun no war zamaney se,
nga ra war ma haya henanante nda haya koonu fay kʼi kaa cere ra, ka iharramante nda ihalalante kaa cere ra,
ka Izirayel borey cawandi yaamarey kul kaŋ Abadantaa na Musa kʼi yaamar.»

Musa nee Haruna, nda Eleyazar, nda Itamar, nga izʼarey kaŋ cindi se: «Wa taasu sargaroo zaa, woo kaŋ cindi sargari tonantey ra Abadantaa maaɲoo ga, wʼa ŋaa bila dolobiri sargari tonadogoo jeroo ga, zama haya no kaŋ ga hanse ka henan.
War mʼa ŋaa nongu henanante ra, zama woo ti ni bagaa nda ni izʼarey bagaa kaŋ war ga duu a sargari tonantey ra Abadantaa maaɲoo ga, zama woo nda ay yaamarandi.

War ma gandoo kaŋ hun sargari zinji-zinjantaa ra nda cewoo kaŋ hun sargaroo ra kaŋ i nʼa kaa ŋaa nongu henanante ra, ni, nda ni izʼarey, nda ni ize woyey mʼi ŋaa cere bande. Zama i nka nondi ma ne sanda ni bagaa, nda ni izey bagaa Izirayel borey alaafiya teendi sargarey ra.

I ma kate cewoo kaŋ hun sargaroo ra kaŋ i nʼa kaa, nda gandoo kaŋ hun sargari zinji-zinjantaa ra, nda sargari tonantey maaney, kʼi zinji sanda sargari zinji-zinjante Abadantaa jine. Wey din, ni nda ni izʼarey ni bande wane nda ey, i ga tee baa duumante sanda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na yaamar.»
Musa na zunubu sargari jindaaroo alhabar hãa, amma nga ne, a tonandi. A futu Eleyazar nda Itamar ga, Haruna izʼarey kaŋ cindi, a nee:
«Cin se war mana zunubu sargaroo ŋaa nongu henanante ra? Zama haya no kaŋ ga hanse ka henan. Abadantaa nkʼa noo war se hala war ma jamaa layboo zaa ka zunubu tuusuyanoo tee i se nga jine.
Nga ne, kuroo mana katandi nongu henanantaa gundoo ra, taka kul kaŋ no, war hima kʼa ŋaa nongu henanantaa ra sanda takaa kaŋ nda ay nʼa yaamar.»
Haruna nee Musa se: «Nga ne, hõ i na ngi zunubu sargaroo kaa nda ngi sargari kukurantaa Abadantaa jine. Hayey wey tee ay ga, nda ay na zunubu sargaroo ŋaa hõ, a ga kan Abadantaa se wala?»
Musa maarʼa, de a kan a se.
Abadantaa šelaŋ Musa nda Haruna se ka nee:
«Wa šelaŋ Izirayel borey se ka nee: ‹Adabbawey kul kaŋ goo laboo ga, wey kaŋ war ga hin kʼi ŋaa ti:
almaney kaŋ ga goyaw ra, war ga hin ka haya kul ŋaa kaŋ kobsoo ga faya, de ceetaamoo ga fersi ihinka.
Amma wey kaŋ si ŋandi wey kaŋ ga goyaw ra nda wey kaŋ kobsoo ga faya ra ti: yoo, zama a ga goyaw, amma kobsoo si faya. A ga harram war se,
nda tondoo ntabay, zama a ga goyaw, amma kobsoo si faya. A ga harram war se,
nda ntabay, zama a ga goyaw, amma kobsoo si faya. A ga harram war se,
nda nbirŋa, zama kobsoo ga faya, de ceetaamoo ga fersi ihinka, amma a si goyaw. A ga harram war se.
War masi ngi hamey ŋaa, war masi tuku ngi jifaa ga. I ga harram war se.
Wey kaŋ war ga hin kʼi ŋaa hayey kul kaŋ goo haroo ra ne: wey kul kaŋ goo nda ziihaya nda kokoši kaŋ goo haroo ra, a ma tee teekoo wala isaa, war ga hin kʼi ŋaa.
Amma haya kul kaŋ sii nda ziihaya nda kokoši kaŋ goo teekoo nda isaa ra, haya kul kaŋ ga ɲuuriɲuuri haroo ra, nda adabba kul kaŋ goo haroo ra, i ga tee war se haya wangante.
I ma tee war se haya wangante, war masi ngi hamey ŋaa, war ma wanga ngi jifawey.
Haya kul kaŋ goo haroo ra kaŋ sii nda ziihaya nda kokoši ga tee war se haya wangante.
Cirawey ra, wey kaŋ war mʼi wanga ey, war masʼi ŋaa, haya wanganteyaŋ no, manʼti kala jigaara, nda jigaara kaabekoyni, nda taši,
nda algabu ciray, nda algabu bibi dumi nda dumi,
nda gaaru-gaaru dumi kul,
nda taatagay, nda cirawfutu, nda jufuleele, nda gabu dumi nda dumi,
nda duuricanba, nda miri-miri-ngondiya, nda cirawfutu beeri,
nda cirawfutu kaaray, nda saajoo cirawfutu, nda jigaara,
nda alwaaliya, nda cirawkaaray dumi nda dumi, nda ciraw zunbukoyni, nda atafirfir.
Fatakoyni kaccu kul kaŋ ga dira cee taaci ga, ga tee war se haya wangante.
Amma hayey kaŋ war ga hin kʼi ŋaa fatakoyney ra kaŋ ga dira cee taaci ga ti wey kaŋ ngi ceetaamey se beene i goo nda cee taabanteyaŋ kaŋ nda i ga sar laboo ga.
Hayey kaŋ war ga hin kʼi ŋaa ti ndoo dumi beeri nda dumi kaccu nda cirilondi dumi beeri nda dumi kaccu.
Amma fatakoyni cindey kul kaŋ goo nda cee taaci ga tee war se haya wangante.›»
«‹Hayayaŋ ne kaŋ ga war žiibandi, boro kul kaŋ tuku ngi jifaa ga, ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra.
Boro kul kaŋ na ngi jifaa affoo zaa, ma nga bankaarawey ɲumandi, a ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra.
Adabba kul kaŋ kobsoo ga faya, amma ceetaamoo si fersi ihinka, a si goyaw, a ga harram war se. Boro kul kaŋ tuku a ga, ga žiibi.
Haya kul kaŋ ga dira nga ceetaamey ga adabbawey kaŋ goo nda cee taaci ra, ga harram war se, boro kul kaŋ tuku ngi jifaa ga, ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra.
Boro kul kaŋ na ngi jifaa zaa, ma nga bankaarawey ɲumandi, a ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra. I ga harram war se.
Hayey kaŋ ga harram war se gandakoyey ra kaŋ ga ɲuuriɲuuri laboo ga ti: minay, nda nceŋ, nda agazirim dumi nda dumi,
nda ncita, nda cilimtaala, nda nkuura, nda jingam, nda daamamolooli.
Wey ga harram war se gandakoyey kul ra, boro kul kaŋ tuku ngi bukawey ga, ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra.

Nda a buu ka kaŋ, haya kul kaŋ ga no ga žiibi, a ma tee bundu gamal, wala bankaaray, wala kuuru, wala bolbol, jinay kul kaŋ ga yantasu hanse, a ma huru hari ra, a ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra. Woo banda ga, a ga henan.
Labutuu kul kaŋ ra ngi affoo kaŋ, haya kul kaŋ goo a ra ga žiibi, war ma labutuwoo kayri.
Ŋaayan kul kaŋ ga ŋandi kaŋ labutuwoo din haroo too a do ga žiibi. Haŋhaya kul kaŋ ga haŋandi kaŋ goo jinay kul kaŋ ra no ga žiibi.
Jinay kul kaŋ ga ngi jifaa affoo kaŋ, ga žiibi, a ma tee alforon wala feema, i ma kayrandi, i ga harram, i ma harram war se.
Amma hariɲaa wala day kaŋyaŋ ti hari kanidoo ga halal, amma boro kaŋ tuku ngi jifaa ga, ga žiibi.
Nda ngi jifaa affoo kaŋ dumi boŋ kaŋ ga dumandi, dumiyoo ga halal.
Nda a gar i na hari daŋ dumiyoo ga, ngi jifaa affoo kaŋ a ga, a ga harram war se.
Nda adabbawey kaŋ ga tee war se ŋaahaya affoo jifa, boro kaŋ tuku jifaa ga, ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra.
Boro kaŋ na jifaa ŋaa ma nga bankaarawey ɲumandi, a ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra, boro mo kaŋ na jifaa zaa ma nga bankaarawey ɲumandi, a ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra.
Gandako kul kaŋ ga ɲuuriɲuuri laboo ga, manʼti kala haya wangante, a masi ŋandi.
Hayey kul kaŋ ga dira gundey ga, nda wey kul kaŋ ga dira cee taaci ga, nda wey kul kaŋ goo nda cee boobo ka ɲuuriɲuuri laboo ga gandakoyey ra, war masʼi ŋaa, zama haya wanganteyaŋ no.
War masi war boŋ tee haya wangante nda gandakoyey wey kaŋ ga ɲuuriɲuuri, war masi war boŋ žiibandi nda ey, i masi war žiibandi ngi bande.
Zama agay ti Abadantaa, war Koyoo. Wa war boŋ daŋ jere ga Irkoy se ka tee nga boro henananteyaŋ
, zama ay ga henan. War masi war boŋ žiibandi nda gandakoyey kaŋ ga ziilam-ziilam laboo ga affoo.
Zama agay ti Abadantaa kaŋ na war žigandi ka hun Misira gandaa ra, hala ya tee war se Irkoy. War ma henan, zama ay ga henan.›»
Woo ti adabbawey nda cirawey ašariyaa, nda hayey kul kaŋ ga ziilam-ziilam haroo ra, nda wey kul kaŋ ga ɲuuriɲuuri laboo ga,
nga ra haya harramante nda ihalalante ga fayandi ka hun cere ra, hoogaa kaŋ ga ŋandi nda woo kaŋ si ŋandi here.
Abadantaa šelaŋ Musa se ka nee:
«Šelaŋ Izirayel borey se ka nee: ‹Nda woy na gunde zaa, a duu nga boŋ izʼaru, a ga žiibi jirbi iyye, a ga žiibi sanda waati kaŋ a ga dii nga gaaham žiiboo.
Jirbi yaahantoo hane, zankaa ma hurubangu.

Woyoo ma jirbi waranza cindi hinza (33) goro, hala waati kaŋ nga kuroo žiiboo ma ben a ga. A masi tuku haya henanante kul do, a masi koy nongu henanantaa ra, hala han kaŋ nga henanandiyanoo jirbey timme.

Amma nda woy no a duu a, a ga žiibi jirbiiyye hinka, a ga žiibi sanda waati kaŋ a ga dii nga gaaham žiiboo. Woo banda ga, a ma goro jirbi woydu cindi iddu (66), hala waati kaŋ kuroo žiiboo ma ben a ga.

Waati kaŋ nga henanandiyanoo jirbey timme, izʼaru wala ize woy no a duu a, a ma koy nda a sargari juwalkaa do, cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga, jiiri foo feeji-ize, a ma tee sargari kukurante, nda tuuzun-ize, wala gubaguba ka tee zunubu sargari.
Sargari juwalkaa mʼi sarga Abadantaa jine, a ma henanandiyanoo tee a se, de a ga henan, zama nga kuroo kay. Woo ti woy kaŋ na izʼaru wala ize woy hay ašariyaa.
Nda a sii nda hini ka duu feeji, a ma gubaguba hinka wala tuuzun-ize hinka zaa, affoo sargari kukurantaa se, affaa zunubu sargaroo se. Sargari juwalkaa ma henanandiyanoo tee a se, de a ga henan.›»
Abadantaa šelaŋ Musa nda Haruna se ka nee:
«Nda adamize kuuroo ga funsu-ize wala doridoo kogo wala ndella kaaray goo, de a tee kuuroo ra dori sanda jiray, i mʼa ka koy sargari juwalkaa Haruna wala nga izʼarey sargari juwalkey affoo do.

Sargari juwalkaa ma doroo laasaabu kaŋ goo kuuroo ga. Nda doroo dogoo hinbiroo bere ka kaaray, de doroo ga hima nda a guusu ka bisa kuuroo, jiray dumi dori no. Sargari juwalkaa mʼa guna, de a ma bayrandi kaŋ a žiibi.
Nda ndellaa kaŋ goo kuuroo ga, ga kaaray, de a si hima nda a guusu ka bisa kuuroo, hinbiroo mana bere ka kaaray. Sargari juwalkaa ma dorikoynoo daabu jirbi iyye.
Sargari juwalkaa mʼa laasaabu jirbi iyyantoo hane, nda a gar kaŋ nga do doroo cindi nga takaa ga, a mana daaru kuuroo ga, sargari juwalkaa ma yee kʼa daabu jirbi iyye koyne.

Sargari juwalkaa mʼa guna koyne jirbi iyyantoo hane, nda a gar kaŋ doroo goo ma dere, a mana daaru kuuroo ga, sargari juwalkaa ma bayrandi kaŋ a henan. Doridoo kogo no, a ma nga bankaarawey ɲumandi, de a ga henan.
Amma nda doridoo kogaa daaru kuuroo ga ka tonton sargari juwalkaa laasaaburoo nda ka bayrandi kaŋ a henan banda ga, a ma nga boŋ cebe sargari juwalkaa se koyne.
Sargari juwalkaa mʼa laasaabu, nda a gar kaŋ doridoo kogaa daaru kuuroo ga, sargari juwalkaa ma bayrandi kaŋ a žiibi, jiray dumi no.
Nda jiray dumi dori fatta boro ga, i mʼa ka koy sargari juwalkaa do.
Sargari juwalkaa mʼa laasaabu, nda a gar kaŋ funsu-ize kaaray goo kuuroo ga, de a na hinbiroo kaarayandi, ham zay doo goo funsoo ga,
jiray no kaŋ nin kuuroo ga. Sargari juwalkaa ma bayrandi kaŋ a žiibi. A masʼa daabu, zama a žiibi.
Nda jiraa hanse ka kuuroo dii, nda jiraa na boraa kaŋ ga doroo goo kuuroo kul daabu kʼa dii boŋoo ka koy cewey ga, wey kul kaŋ sargari juwalkaa ga dii a,
sargari juwalkaa mʼa laasaabu, nda a gar kaŋ jiraa na gaahamoo kul daabu, a ma bayrandi kaŋ boraa kaŋ ga doroo goo henan. Nga kul ka kaaray, a henan.
Amma han kaŋ i dii ham zay a ga, a ga žiibi.
Nda sargari juwalkaa na hamoo kaŋ zay guna, a ma bayrandi kaŋ a žiibi. Hamoo kaŋ zay ga žiibi, jiray dumi no.
Amma nda hamoo kaŋ zay bere ka yee ka tee ikaaray, a ma yee sargari juwalkaa do.
Sargari juwalkaa mʼa laasaabu, nda a gar kaŋ doroo bere ka tee ikaaray, sargari juwalkaa ma bayrandi kaŋ boraa kaŋ ga doroo goo henan. A henan.
Nda futta fatta kuuroo ga, de a duu baani,
nongoo kaŋ ra futtaa tee, funsu-ize kaaray, wala nda ndella kaaray kaŋ moɲoo ga ciray fatta a ra, boraa ma nga boŋ cebe sargari juwalkaa se.
Sargari juwalkaa mʼa laasaabu, nda a gar kaŋ a ga hima nda a guusu ka bisa kuuroo, nga hinbiroo bere ka tee ikaaray, sargari juwalkaa ma bayrandi kaŋ a žiibi. Jiray dumi dori no kaŋ fatta futtaa ga.
Nda sargari juwalkaa nʼa guna, nda a gar kaŋ hinbiri kaaray sii a ga, a mana guusu ka bisa kuuroo, a goo ma dere, sargari juwalkaa mʼa daabu jirbi iyye.
Nda a daaru ka tonton kuuroo ga, sargari juwalkaa ga bayrandi kaŋ a žiibi, dori no.
Amma nda ndellaa cindi nga dogoo ra, a mana daaru, futtaa ndellaa no, sargari juwalkaa ma bayrandi kaŋ a henan.
Nda nongu kaŋ ton goo kuuroo ga, de tondogoo silbaa manʼti kala ndella kaaray moo ciray wala ikaaray,

sargari juwalkaa mʼa laasaabu, nda a gar kaŋ hinbiroo bere ka tee ikaaray ndellaa ra, de a ga hima nda a guusu ka bisa kuuroo, jiray no, a fatta tondogoo ga, sargari juwalkaa ma bayrandi kaŋ a žiibi, jiray dori no.
Nda sargari juwalkaa nʼa guna, nda a gar kaŋ hinbiri kaaray sii ndellaa ra, a si hima nda a guusu ka bisa kuuroo, a goo ma dere, sargari juwalkaa mʼa daabu jirbi iyye.
Sargari juwalkaa mʼa guna jirbi iyyantoo hane. Nda ndellaa daaru kuuroo ga ka tonton, sargari juwalkaa ma bayrandi kaŋ a žiibi, jiray dori no.
Amma nda ndellaa cindi nga dogoo ra, a mana daaru kuuroo ga, a goo ma dere, tonyan futta no. Sargari juwalkaa ma bayrandi kaŋ a henan, zama nongoo kaŋ ton ndellaa no.
Nda aru wala woy duu dori nga boŋoo wala nga toonaa ga,

sargari juwalkaa ma doroo laasaabu, nda a gar kaŋ a ga hima nda a guusu ka bisa kuuroo, hinbiri kara say-sayante goo a ga. Sargari juwalkaa ma bayrandi kaŋ a žiibi, forgo no, boŋ wala toono jiray dumi no.
Nda sargari juwalkaa na forgaa doroo guna, nda a gar kaŋ a si hima nda a guusu ka bisa kuuroo, hinbiri bibi sii a ga, sargari juwalkaa ma boraa kaŋ ga forgo doroo goo daabu jirbi iyye.
Sargari juwalkaa ga doroo guna jirbi iyyantoo hane, nda a gar kaŋ forgaa mana daaru, hinbiri kara sii a ga, de a si hima nda a guusu ka bisa kuuroo,
boraa ma cebu, amma a masi forgaa dogoo cebu, sargari juwalkaa ma forgokoynoo daabu jirbi iyye koyne.

Sargari juwalkaa ga forgaa guna jirbi iyyantoo hane, nda a gar kaŋ a mana daaru kuuroo ga, a si hima nda a guusu ka bisa kuuroo, sargari juwalkaa ma bayrandi kaŋ a henan. Boraa ma nga bankaarawey ɲumandi, de a ga henan.
Amma nda forgaa daaru kuuroo ga ka tonton, nga henanandiyanoo banda ga,
sargari juwalkaa mʼa laasaabu, nda a gar kaŋ forgaa daaru kuuroo ga, sargari juwalkaa masi hinbiri kara ceeci, a žiibi.
Nda nga do, forgaa cindi nga dogoo ra, de hinbiri bibiyaŋ zay a ra, forgaa ben. A henan, sargari juwalkaa ma bayrandi kaŋ a henan.
Nda aru wala woy duu ndellayaŋ nga kuuroo ga, ndella kaarayyaŋ,
sargari juwalkaa mʼa laasaabu, nda a gar kaŋ nga kuuroo ga ndella kaaray kaŋ goo ma dere goo, ndella de no kaŋ fatta kuuroo ga, a henan.
Nda aru boŋ hinbirey hun, a taylel, a henan.
Nda nga boŋoo jineheroo hinbirey ka hun, teɲa se beene ka taylel, a henan.
Nda taylel dogoo jine wala banda, dori kaaray kaŋ moɲoo ga ciray goo a ra, jiray no kaŋ fatta taylel dogoo jine wala banda heroo ra.
Sargari juwalkaa mʼa laasaabu, nda a gar kaŋ doroo futtaa manʼti kala ikaaray kaŋ moɲoo ga ciray kaŋ goo tayleloo jineheroo wala banda heroo ra, a ga hima nda jiray kaŋ goo kuuroo ra,
jiraykoyni no, a žiibi. Sargari juwalkaa ma bayrandi kaŋ nga kul ka žiibi, boŋoo ga nga doroo goo.
Jiraykoynoo kaŋ ga doroo goo ma darbay kottayaŋ daŋ, a ma nga boŋoo feeri, a ma nga kaaboo daabu, a ma kaati ka nee: ‹Žiibi, žiibi!›
Waatoo kul kaŋ doroo goo a ga, a ga žiibi. A žiibi, a ma goro nga hinne, a ga goro jamaa kaloo se taray.
Nda bankaaray ga fuune fatta, a ma tee haabu darbay wala leŋ šukka darbay,
a ma tee šukka wala šukka kaŋ kayandi, leŋ wala haabu, a ma tee kuuru wala jinay kul kaŋ no kaŋ teendi kuuru ra,
nda ndellaa manʼti kala ifirzi wala iciray darbaa, wala kuuroo, wala šukkaa, wala šukkaa kaŋ kayandi, wala jinay kul kaŋ teendi kuuru ra ga, fuune ndella no, a ma cebandi sargari juwalkaa se.
Sargari juwalkaa ma ndellaa laasaabu, a ma jinaa kaŋ ga ndellaa huru daabu jirbi iyye.
Jirbi iyyantoo hane, a ma ndellaa guna, nda a daaru darbaa, wala šukkaa, wala šukkaa kaŋ kayandi, wala kuuroo, wala jinay kul kaŋ teendi kuuru ra ga, ndellaa manʼti kala fuune kaŋ nin, a žiibi.
Darbaa, wala šukkaa, wala šukkaa kaŋ kayandi, haabu wala leŋ, a ma tee jinay kul kaŋ teendi kuuru ra kaŋ ga ndellaa goo, ma tonandi, zama fuune kaŋ nin no. Hayaa ma tonandi nuune ra ka tee boosu.
Nda sargari juwalkaa nʼa laasaabu, nda a gar kaŋ ndellaa mana daaru darbaa, wala šukkaa, wala šukkaa kaŋ kayandi, wala jinay kul kaŋ teendi kuuru ra ga,
sargari juwalkaa ma yaamar kaŋ hayaa ma ɲumandi kaŋ ga ndellaa huru, de a ma yee kʼa daabu jirbi iyye koyne.

Sargari juwalkaa mʼa guna ɲumandiyanoo banda ga, nda a gar kaŋ ndellaa mana alhaali barmay, a mana daaru, a žiibi, a ma tonandi nuune ra ka tee boosu. Guusu no kaŋ tee darbaa jine wala banda heroo ra.
Nda sargari juwalkaa nʼa guna, nda a gar kaŋ ndellaa goo ma dere ɲumandiyanoo banda ga, a mʼa dunbu kʼa kaa darbaa, wala kuuroo, wala šukkaa, wala šukkaa kaŋ kayandi ga.
Nda a yee ka fatta darbaa, wala šukkaa, wala šukkaa kaŋ kayandi, wala jinay kul kaŋ teendi kuuru ra ga, fuune no kaŋ goo ma bangay. Ma jinaa kaŋ ga ndellaa huru ton nuune ra kʼa tee boosu.
Darbaa, wala šukkaa, wala šukkaa kaŋ kayandi, wala jinay kul kaŋ teendi kuuru ra kaŋ nʼnʼa ɲumandi ka ndellaa kaa, ma ɲumandi koyne, a henan.»
Woo ti fuune ndella kaŋ huru haabu wala leŋ darbay, wala šukka, wala šukka kaŋ kayandi, wala jinay kul kaŋ teendi kuuru ra ga ašariyaa hala boraa ma bayrandi kaŋ a henan wala a žiibi.
Abadantaa šelaŋ Musa se ka nee:
«Jiraykoyni ašariyaa ne nga henanandiyanoo hane: waati kaŋ i nʼa ka koy sargari juwalkaa do,
sargari juwalkaa ma koy jamaa kaloo se taray, a mʼa laasaabu, nda a gar kaŋ jiraykoynoo duu baani nga jiraa doroo ra,
sargari juwalkaa ma yaamar kaŋ i ma kate boraa kaŋ ga hima ka henan se: ciraw hunante halalante hinka, nda sedere bundu, nda šilli ciray zaram, nda izopu bundu.
Sargari juwalkaa ma yaamar kaŋ i ma ciraw faa koosu labu kusu kaŋ ra hari henna goo boŋ.
Ciraw hunantaa, a mʼa zaa, nga nda sedere bundoo, nda šilli ciray zaramoo, nda izopu bundoo, a mʼi sufa ciraa kaŋ koosandi hari hennaa boŋ kuroo ra.
A ma say-saya cee iyye jiraykoynoo ga kaŋ ga hima ka henan nga jiraa ra. Woo banda ga, a ma bayrandi kaŋ a henan, de a ma ciraw hunantaa taŋ saajoo ra.

Boraa kaŋ ga hima ka henan ma nga bankaarawey ɲumay, a ma nga hinbirey kul cebu, a ma ɲumay haroo ra, de a ga henan. Woo banda ga, a ga hin ka huru jamaa kaloo ra, amma a ma cindi hukkumoo se taray jirbi iyye.
Jirbi iyyantoo hane, a ma nga hinbirey kul cebu, boŋoo, nda kaaboo, nda moo beene hinbirey, a ma nga hinbiroo kul cebu, a ma nga bankaarawey ɲumandi, a ma nga gaahamoo ɲumay nda hari, de a ga henan.

Jirbi yaahantoo hane, a ma feeji aru-ize hinka kaŋ ga malal sii, nda feeji woy-ize kaŋ goo nda jiiri foo kaŋ ga malal sii, nda farin hamni kilo yagga cine kaŋ loobandi nda jii ka tee taasu sargari, nda jii liitar jere zaa.
Sargari juwalkaa kaŋ ga henanandiyanoo tee ma boraa kaŋ ga hima ka henan nda hayey wey daŋ Abadantaa jine cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga.
Sargari juwalkaa ma feeji aru-ize faa dii kʼa tee tooɲe sargari, nga nda liitar jeraa jiyoo, a mʼi zinji kʼi tee sargari zinji-zinjante Abadantaa jine.

A ma feeji aru-izoo koosu nongoo kaŋ ra zunubu sargaroo nda sargari kukurantaa koosandi, nongu henanante ra, zama takaa kaŋ ti zunubu sargaroo, nga da ti tooɲe sargaroo, sargari juwalkaa ma duu a, haya no kaŋ ga hanse ka henan.
Sargari juwalkaa ma zaa tooɲe sargaroo kuroo ra kʼa daŋ boraa kaŋ ga hima ka henan haŋa hennaa deenoo ga, nda nga kabe hennaa kobaaroo ga, nda cee hennaa cew-ize beeroo ga.
Sargari juwalkaa ma zaa liitar jeraa jiyoo ra kʼa doori nga kabe laalaa ra,
a ma nga kabe hennaa kabe-ize foo sufa jiyoo ra kaŋ goo kabe laalaa ra, a ma nga kabe-izoo ka zaa jiyoo ra kʼa say-say cee iyye Abadantaa jine.

Sargari juwalkaa ma zaa jii cindoo ra kaŋ goo nga kaboo ra kʼa daŋ boraa kaŋ ga hima ka henan haŋa hennaa deenoo ga, nda nga kabe hennaa kobaaroo ga, nda nga cee hennaa cew-ize beeroo ga, tooɲe sargaroo kuroo boŋ.
Jiyoo cindoo kaŋ goo sargari juwalkaa kaboo ra, a mʼa fur boraa kaŋ ga hima ka henan boŋoo ga, a ma henanandiyanoo tee a se Abadantaa jine.
Sargari juwalkaa ma zunubu sargaroo kaa, a ma henanandiyanoo tee a se kʼa henanandi ka žiiboo kaa a ga. Woo banda ga, a ma sargari kukurantaa almanoo koosu.
Sargari juwalkaa ma sargari kukurantaa nda taasu sargaroo kaa sargari tonadogoo ga. Sargari juwalkaa ma henanandiyanoo tee boraa se, de a ga henan.

Nda boro ga talka, de nga hinoo si too hayey wey, a ma feeji aru-ize foo kaa tooɲe sargari kʼa tee sargari zinji-zinjante ka henanandiyanoo tee a se. A ma farin hamni kilo hinza kaŋ loobandi nda jii zaa kʼa kaa taasu sargari nda jii liitar jere,
nda gubaguba hinka wala tuuzun-ize hinka kaŋ nga hinoo ga toorʼa, affoo zunubu sargari se, affaa sargari kukurante se.
Nga henanandiyanoo jirbi yaahantoo hane, a ma kate ey sargari juwalkaa do cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga Abadantaa jine.
Sargari juwalkaa ma tooɲe sargaroo feeji aru-izoo dii nda liitar jeraa jiyoo, a mʼi zinji kʼi tee sargari zinji-zinjante Abadantaa jine.
A ma tooɲe sargaroo feejoo koosu, a ma zaa tooɲe sargaroo kuroo ra kʼa daŋ boraa kaŋ ga hima ka henan haŋa hennaa deenoo ga, nda nga kabe hennaa kobaaroo ga, nda cee hennaa cew-ize beeroo ga.
Sargari juwalkaa ma doori jiyoo ra nga kabe laalaa ra.
Kabe hennaa kabe-ize foo, a mʼa ka zaa jiyoo ra kaŋ goo kabe laalaa ra, a mʼa say-say cee iyye Abadantaa jine.

Jiyoo kaŋ goo sargari juwalkaa kaboo ra, a ma daŋ a ra boraa kaŋ ga hima ka henan haŋa hennaa deenoo ga, nda nga kabe hennaa kobaaroo ga, nda cee hennaa cew-ize beeroo ga, nongoo kaŋ ra tooɲe sargaroo kuroo jisandi.
Woo kaŋ cindi jiyoo ra kaŋ goo sargari juwalkaa kaboo ra, a mʼa fur boraa kaŋ ga hima ka henan boŋoo ga ka henanandiyanoo tee a se Abadantaa jine.
Woo banda ga, nga nda nga hinagoo, a ma gubagubawey affoo wala tuuzun-izey affoo sarga.
Nga hinagoo ra, a ma affoo kaa zunubu sargari se, affaa sargari kukurante, taasu sargaroo bande. Sargari juwalkaa ma henanandiyanoo tee boraa se kaŋ ga hima ka henan Abadantaa jine.»
Woo ti ašariyaa boro se kaŋ ga jiray doroo goo, de nga hinoo si too henanandiyanoo hayey.
Abadantaa šelaŋ Musa nda Haruna se ka nee:
«Waati kaŋ war huru Kanaŋ gandaa ra kaŋ ay gʼa noo war se a ma tee war mayraa, nda ay na fuune ndella daŋ hugu ra kaŋ goo gandaa ra kaŋ ti war mayraa,
boraa kaŋ wane nda hugoo ma koy a bayrandi sargari juwalkaa se ka nee: ‹Ay dii ndella dumi ay hugoo ra.›

Sargari juwalkaa ma yaamar kaŋ i ma jinawey fattandi hugoo ra za nga mana kaa ka ndellaa guna, hala hayey kaŋ goo hugoo ra kul masi koy harram. Woo banda ga, sargari juwalkaa ma huru ka hugoo laasaabu.
A ma ndellaa laasaabu, nda a gar kaŋ ndella guusa firziyaŋ wala icirayyaŋ goo hugoo cetewey ga, i ga hima nda i guusu cetewey ra,
sargari juwalkaa ma fatta hugoo ra, waati kaŋ a too hugoo miɲoo ga, a ma hugoo daabu jirbi iyye.
Jirbi iyyantoo hane, sargari juwalkaa ma yee ka koy a guna, nda a gar kaŋ ndellaa daaru hugoo cetewey bande,
sargari juwalkaa ma yaamar kaŋ i ma tondey kaa kaŋ ga ndellaa goo, i mʼi warra koyraa banda ga nongu harramante ra.
A ma hugoo gundoo kuubi kʼa bere kʼa koosu. Laboo kaŋ koosandi, i mʼa mun koyraa banda ga nongu harramante ra.
I ma tondi tanayaŋ zaa kʼi daŋ ijinawey dogey ra. I ma labu tana ka hugoo sanfa.
Nda ndellaa yee ka kaa ka fatta hugoo ra, tondey kaayanoo, nda koosuyanoo, nda sanfayanoo banda ga,
sargari juwalkaa ma yee ka koy a guna, nda a gar kaŋ ndellaa daaru hugoo ga, fuune no kaŋ nin, a harram.
I ma hugoo, nda nga tondey, nda bundey, nda hugoo laboo kayri, i mʼi ka koy koyraa dumaa ga nongu harramante ra.
Boro kaŋ huru hugoo ra waatey kaŋ a ga daaba ra, ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra.
Boro kaŋ kani hugoo ra ma nga darbawey ɲumandi. Boro kaŋ ŋaa hugoo ra ma nga darbawey ɲumandi.
Amma nda sargari juwalkaa yee ka huru kʼa guna, nda a gar kaŋ ndellaa mana daaru hugoo ga nga sanfayanoo banda ga, sargari juwalkaa ma bayrandi kaŋ hugoo henan, ndellaa dere.
Hugoo zunubu tuusuyanoo se a ma ciraw hinka, nda sedere bundu, nda šilli ciray zaram, nda izopu bundu zaa.
A ma ciraw faa koosu labu kusu boŋ, labu kusu kaŋ ra hari henna goo boŋ.
A ma sedere bundoo, nda izopu bundoo, nda šilli ciray zaramoo, nda ciraw hunantaa zaa kʼi sufa ciraa kaŋ koosandi kuroo nda hari hennaa ra. A ma say-saya cee iyye hugoo ga.
A ma hugoo zunubu tuusuyanoo tee nda ciraa kuroo nda hari hennaa, nda ciraw hunantaa, nda sedere bundoo, nda izopu bundoo, nda šilli ciray zaramoo.
A ma ciraw hunantaa taŋ koyraa banda ga, saajoo ra. A ma henanandiyanoo tee hugoo se, de a ga henan.»
Woo ti jiray dori wala fuune ndella dumi kul kaŋ no, nda forgo,
nda bankaaray ndella, nda hugu ndella,
nda funsu, nda futta, nda ndella kaaray ašariyaa,
ka bayrandi waati kaŋ haya žiibi nda waati kaŋ haya henan. Woo ti jiray nda fuune ašariyaa.
Abadantaa šelaŋ Musa nda Haruna se ka nee:
«Šelaŋ Izirayel borey se ka nee: ‹Aru kul kaŋ nga harimundogoo ga mandi, nga mandiroo gʼa žiibandi.
Hayaa ne kaŋ ga kate nga mandiroo mʼa žiibandi: nga harimundogoo ma mandi wala a ma mandiroo dii, nga žiiboo no.
Daari kul kaŋ ga boraa kaŋ ga mandi kani ga žiibi, haya kul kaŋ ga a goro ga žiibi.
Boro kaŋ tuku nga daaroo ga ma nga bankaarawey ɲumandi, a ma nga boŋ ɲumay nda hari, a ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra.
Boro kaŋ goro jinay ga kaŋ ga boraa kaŋ ga mandi doona ka goro, boraa ma nga bankaarawey ɲumandi, a ma nga boŋ ɲumay nda hari, a ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra.
Boro kaŋ tuku boraa kaŋ ga mandi gaahamoo ga, boraa ma nga bankaarawey ɲumandi, a ma nga boŋ ɲumay nda hari, a ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra.
Nda boraa kaŋ ga mandi tufa boro ga kaŋ ga henan, boraa ma nga bankaarawey ɲumandi, a ma nga boŋ ɲumay nda hari, a ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra.
Kaarumay kul kaŋ ga boraa kaŋ ga mandi žigi, ga žiibi.

Boro kul kaŋ tuku haya kul kaŋ no ga kaŋ bay ka cindi a cire, a ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra. Boro kul kaŋ na jinawey wey affoo zaa, ma nga bankaarawey ɲumandi, a ma nga boŋ ɲumay nda hari, a ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra.
Boro kul kaŋ ga boraa kaŋ ga mandi tuku, a mana nga kabey ɲumay, boraa ma nga bankaarawey ɲumandi, a ma nga boŋ ɲumay nda hari, a ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra.
Labu jinay kaŋ ga boraa kaŋ ga mandi tuku, ma kayrandi, bundu jinawey ma leelandi nda hari.
Waati kaŋ boraa kaŋ ga mandi, mandiroo kay, a ma jirbi iyye kabu nga henanandiyanoo se, a ma nga bankaarawey ɲumandi, a ma nga gaahamoo ɲumay hari dandidoo hari ra, de a ga henan.
Jirbi yaahantoo hane, a ma gubaguba hinka wala tuuzun-ize hinka zaa, a ma kaa Abadantaa jine cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga kʼi noo sargari juwalkaa se.
Sargari juwalkaa mʼi sarga, affoo zunubu sargari, affaa sargari kukurante. Sargari juwalkaa ma henanandiyanoo tee a se Abadantaa jine nga mandiroo se.
Nda aru almaaniyoo mun a ga, a ma nga gaahamoo kul ɲumay nda hari, a ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra.
Bankaaray nda kuuru kul kaŋ ga almaaniyoo huru ma ɲumandi nda hari, a ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra.
Nda woy nda aru marga nda cere, i ma ngi boŋ ɲumay nda hari, i ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra.
Nda woy ga mandi, nga mandiroo manʼti kala nga gaaham žiiboo, a ma cindi nga žiiboo ra jirbi iyye, boro kul kaŋ tuku a ga, ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra.
Haya kul kaŋ ga a kani waatoo kaŋ a goo nga žiiboo ra, ga žiibi. Haya kul kaŋ ga a goro ga žiibi.
Boro kul kaŋ tuku nga daaroo ga ma nga bankaarawey ɲumandi, a ma nga boŋ ɲumay nda hari, a ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra.
Boro kul kaŋ tuku jinay kul kaŋ ga woyoo doona ka goro, a ma nga bankaarawey ɲumandi, a ma nga boŋ ɲumay nda hari, a ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra.
Nda haya goo daaroo boŋ wala jinaa ga, haya kul kaŋ no kaŋ ga a doona ka goro, boro kaŋ tuku a ga, ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra.
Aru kaŋ marga nda woyoo, woyoo gaaham žiiboo ga huru a ga, a ga žiibi jirbi iyye. Daari kul kaŋ ga a kani ga žiibi.
Nda woy ga kuri mandi jirbi boobo kaŋ manʼti nga gaaham žiiboo waatoo, wala a ga mandi ka gay ka bisa nga gaaham žiiboo waatoo, waatoo kul kaŋ a ga mandi, a ga žiibi sanda nga gaaham žiiboo waatoo.
Daari kul kaŋ ga a kani jirbey kul kaŋ ra a ga mandi ga tee sanda nga gaaham žiiboo daaroo. Jinay kul kaŋ ga a goro ga žiibi sanda nga gaaham žiiboo takaa.
Boro kul kaŋ tuku hayey wey ga, ga žiibi, a ma nga bankaarawey ɲumandi, a ma nga boŋ ɲumay nda hari, a ga žiibi hala almaaroo ra.
Nda nga mandiroo kay, a ma jirbi iyye kabu, woo din banda ga, a ga henan.
Jirbi yaahantoo hane, a ma gubaguba hinka wala tuuzun-ize hinka zaa kʼi ka koy sargari juwalkaa do cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga.
Sargari juwalkaa ma affoo kaa zunubu sargari, affaa sargari kukurante. Sargari juwalkaa ma henanandiyanoo tee a se Abadantaa jine nga gaaham žiiboo mandiroo se.
War ma Izirayel borey moorandi ngi žiiboo, i masi duu kʼay gorodogoo kaŋ goo i game žiibandi ka buu ngi žiiboo ra.›»
Woo ti boro kaŋ ga mandi wala boro kaŋ nga almaaniyoo mun a ga kʼa žiibandi,
wala woy kaŋ ga dor nga gaaham žiiboo maaganda se, boro kul, aru wala woy kaŋ ga mandi, wala aru kaŋ marga nda woy kaŋ ga žiibi, ašariyaa.
Haruna izʼaru hinkaa kaŋ man kate Abadantaa jine, ngi buuyanoo banda ga, Abadantaa šelaŋ Musa se.

Abadantaa nee Musa se: «Šelaŋ ni armaa Haruna se, a masi huru alwaati kul nongu henanantaa ra, ridowoo dumaa ga, daabirjoo jine kaŋ goo sundukoo ga, hala a masi koy buu, zama ay ga bangay duulaa ra sundukoo daabirjoo se beene.
Takaa ne kaŋ nda Haruna ga hima ka huru nongu henanantaa ra: a ma haw yaaru zaa zunubu sargaroo se, nda feeji gaaru sargari kukurantaa se.

A ma šukka kaŋ se i ga nee leŋ kaayi henanante daŋ nga ga, a ma leŋ šukka npogo daŋ, a ma nga centoo haw nda leŋ šukka gamahaw, a ma leŋ šukka fatala didiji nga boŋoo ga, bankaaray henananteyaŋ no. A ma nga gaahamoo ɲumay nda hari jina a mʼi daŋ.
A ma jindaaru hinka taa Izirayel borey jamaa kone kʼi tee zunubu sargari, nda feeji gaaru foo sargari kukurante se.
Haruna ma zunubu sargaroo haw yaaroo sarga nga boŋ se, a ma zunubu tuusuyanoo tee nga boŋ nda nga hugoo se.
A ma jindaaru hinkaa zaa kʼi daŋ Abadantaa jine cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga.
Haruna ma alkurra kar jindaaru hinkaa ga ka dii woo kaŋ Abadantaa ga duu a nda woo kaŋ Azazel
ga duu a.
Haruna ma kate jindaaroo kaŋ alkurraa kate Abadantaa ma duu a, a ma tee zunubu sargari.
Jindaaroo kaŋ alkurraa kate Azazel
ma duu a, nga hunantaa ma jisandi Abadantaa jine hala i ma zunubu tuusuyanoo tee a ga kʼa sanba saajoo ra Azazel do.
Haruna ma zunubu sargaroo haw yaaroo kaa nga boŋ se, a ma zunubu tuusuyanoo tee nga boŋ nda nga hugoo se. A ma zunubu sargari haw yaaroo koosu nga boŋ se.
A ma dugu canboo too nda denji ciray sargari tonadogoo ra kaŋ goo Abadantaa jine, a ma nga kabe hinkaa too nda dugu hew kaana hamni, a mʼi ka koy ridowoo dumaa ga.
A ma dugoo daŋ nuunaa ra kaŋ goo Abadantaa jine hala dugoo dulloo ma daabirjoo kaŋ goo seedetaraa sundukoo boŋ daabu, hala Haruna masi koy buu.
A ma zaa haw yaaroo kuroo ra kʼa say-say nda nga kabe-izoo sundukoo daabirjoo jineheroo ga waynahunay here. A ma nga kabe-izoo ka zaa kuroo ra kʼa say-say cee iyye sundukoo daabirjoo jine.

A ma zunubu sargaroo jindaaroo koosu kaŋ hun jamaa se, a ma kuroo ka koy ridowoo dumaa ga, a ma takaa tee kuroo se kaŋ a nʼa tee haw yaaroo wanoo se, a ma say-saya sundukoo daabirjoo ga nda sundukoo daabirjoo jine.
A ma henanandiyanoo tee nongu henanantaa se Izirayel borey žiibey nda ngi hooyaney ra, maanaa ngi zunubey kul. A ma taka follokaa tee cere kubayyan hukkumoo se kaŋ goo i bande ngi žiibey gamey ra.

Adamize kul masi bara cere kubayyan hukkumoo ra waati kaŋ a koy zunubu tuusuyanoo tee nongu henanantaa ra hala waati kaŋ a fatta. Woo banda ga, a ma zunubu tuusuyanoo tee nga boŋ, nda nga hugoo, nda Izirayel jamaa kul se.
A ma fatta sargari tonadogoo here kaŋ goo Abadantaa jine, a ma zunubu tuusuyanoo tee a se. A ma zaa haw yaaroo kuroo nda jindaaroo kuroo ra kʼi daŋ sargari tonadogoo hilley ga, carawey bande.
A ma nga kabe-izoo ka zaa kuroo ra kʼa say-say cee iyye. A mʼa henanandi ka hun Izirayel borey žiibey ra.
Waati kaŋ a na zunubu tuusuyanoo tee nongu henanantaa, nda cere kubayyan hukkumoo, nda sargari tonadogoo se ka ben, a ma kate jindaaru hunantaa.

Haruna ma nga kabe hinkaa fur jindaaru hunantaa boŋoo ga, a ma Izirayel borey laybey kul har a ga, nda ngi hooyaney kul, nda ngi zunubey kul, a mʼi daŋ jindaaroo boŋoo ga. A mʼa taŋ, aru foo kaŋ kayandi mʼa ka koy saajoo ra.
Jindaaroo ga ngi laybey kul zaa ka koy nongu ra kaŋ ra boro sii. Aroo ma jindaaroo taŋ a ma koy saajoo ra.
Haruna ma huru cere kubayyan hukkumoo ra ka leŋ šukka bankaarawey kaŋ a nʼi daŋ waatoo kaŋ a ga huru nongu henanantaa ra, kaa kʼi jisi no din.

A ma nga gaahamoo ɲumay nda hari nongu henanante ra, a ma nga bankaarawey daŋ. Woo banda ga, a ma fatta ka nga sargari kukurantaa kaa ka jamaa sargari kukurantaa kaa, a ma zunubu tuusuyanoo tee nga boŋ nda jamaa se.
A ma zunubu sargaroo maanoo dullandi sargari tonadogoo boŋ.
Boraa kaŋ na jindaaroo taŋ a ma koy Azazel
do ma nga bankaarawey ɲumandi, a ma nga gaahamoo ɲumay nda hari, woo banda ga, a ga hin ka huru jamaa kaloo ra.

I ma zunubu sargaroo haw yaaroo nda zunubu sargaroo jindaaroo kaŋyaŋ ra kuroo kaandi ka koy nongu henanantaa ra ka henanandiyanoo tee ka koy jamaa kaloo se taray ka ngi kuurey, nda hamey, nda ngi teeley žiibey ton nuune ra kʼi tee boosu.
Boraa kaŋ nʼi ton ma nga bankaarawey ɲumandi, a ma nga gaahamoo ɲumay nda hari, woo banda ga, a ga hin ka huru jamaa kaloo ra.
Hantum kaŋ si tun ne war se: handu iyyantoo jirbi woyantoo (10to) ra, war ma meehaw, war masi goy kul tee, a ma tee ganda-ize wala yaw kaŋ ga waati tee war do.
Zama hanoo din, i ga zunubu tuusuyanoo tee war se hala war ma duu ka henan, de war ga henan war zunubey kul ra Abadantaa jine.
A ma tee war se hunanzam zaari kaŋ bisa hunanzam zaarey jerey, war ma meehaw. Hantum kaŋ si tun no.
Sargari juwalkaa kaŋ yonandi
, kaŋ gorandi sargari juwalyanoo goyoo ra ka huru nga baaba dogoo ra no ma zunubu tuusuyanoo tee. A ma leŋ šukka darbawey daŋ, darbay henanantey.
A ma henanandiyanoo tee nongu henanantey ihenanantaa se, a ma henanandiyanoo tee cere kubayyan hukkumoo nda sargari tonadogoo se, a ma zunubu tuusuyanoo tee sargari juwalkey nda alžamaa kul se.
Woo ma tee war se hantum kaŋ si tun hala zunubu tuusuyanoo ma teendi Izirayel borey se ngi zunubey kul se cee foo jiiroo ra.» A nʼa tee nda takaa kaŋ nda Abadantaa na Musa yaamar.
Abadantaa šelaŋ Musa se ka nee:
«Šelaŋ Haruna, nda nga izʼarey, nda Izirayel borey kul se, nee i se: ‹Hayaa ne kaŋ Abadantaa nʼa yaamar:
“Boro kul kaŋ Izirayel hugu-izey ra ga haw yaaru, wala feeji, wala hancin koosu jamaa kaloo ra, wala a gʼa koosu kaloo se taray,
de a manʼa ka koy cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga kʼa kaa sargari Abadantaa maaɲoo ga, Abadantaa gorodogoo jine, i gʼa hãa nda kuroo din. A na kuri mun, boraa din ga hun nga jamaa ra,

hala Izirayel borey ma duu ka kate ngi sargarey kaŋ i goo mʼi kaa saajoo ra. I ma kate ey Abadantaa maaɲoo ga, cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga, sargari juwalkaa do, i mʼi kaa alaafiya teendi sargaroo Abadantaa maaɲoo ga.
Sargari juwalkaa ma kuroo say-say Abadantaa sargari tonadogoo boŋ, cere kubayyan hukkumoo miɲoo ga, a ma maanoo dullandi kʼa tee sunnaara kaana Abadantaa se.
I masi yee ka ngi sargarey kaa jindaaru toorey maaɲey ga kaŋ bande i ga izefututaray tee
. Woo ma tee i se hantum kaŋ si tun ngi zamaney se.”›
